trans-unit.target: Agus nuair na páistí bhur measc bhaint caithreachais, lig dóibh a iarraidh cead a [gcónaí] siúd os a gcomhair a dhéanamh.

trans-unit.source: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Agus mná d'aois iar-menstrual nach bhfuil aon dúil pósadh - níl aon locht orthu as a chur ar leataobh a gcuid éadaí seachtracha [ach] gan a thaispeánann maisiú.

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand.
trans-unit.target: Níl ar an dall [aon] srianta ná ar an srian bacach ná ar an srian tinn ná ar díbh féin nuair a itheann tú ó do [féin] tithe nó tithe do aithreacha nó na tithe de do mháithreacha nó na tithe de do chuid deartháireacha

trans-unit.source: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muhammad] - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Is iad na believers ach amháin iad siúd a chreideann i Allah agus a Messenger, agus, nuair a bhíonn siad [Cruinniú] leis ar feadh ábhar leasa choitinn, ná imeacht go dtí go iarr siad a chead.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ná déan [do] glaoch ar an Messenger measc féin mar an glaoch ar cheann de tú go dtí ceann eile.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Unquestionably, go Allah mbaineann cuma cad é sna flaithis agus talamh.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -
trans-unit.target: Is beannaithe té a chuir síos ar an Critéar ar a Seirbhíseach go bhféadfadh sé a bheith leis an saol Warner -

trans-unit.source: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.
trans-unit.target: Sé ar leis an tiarnas na spéartha agus an talamh agus nach bhfuil glactha ag mac agus nach ndeachaidh sé mar chomhpháirtí i tiarnas agus chruthaigh gach rud agus a chinneadh sé le [beacht] chinneadh.

trans-unit.source: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Ach tá siad tógtha seachas déithe Eisean a chruthú rud ar bith, cé go bhfuil siad a cruthaíodh, agus ní bhfuil a son féin aon díobháil nó sochar agus nach bhfuil [cumhacht a chur faoi deara] báis nó saoil nó aiséirí.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a disbelieve rá, "Seo [Qur'an] nach bhfuil eisceadh a fiaradh chum sé, agus daoine eile a chabhraigh air ann."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."
trans-unit.target: Agus deir siad, "Legends an iar- bpobal ro scríobh síos, agus tá siad dheachtú chuige maidin agus tráthnóna."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Abair, [O Muhammad], "Tá sé tugtha le fios ag An té a bhfuil aithne aige [gach] rúnda laistigh de na neamh agus talamh. Go deimhin, tá sé riamh Forgiving agus trócaire."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?
trans-unit.target: Agus deir siad, "Cad é seo teachtaire a itheann bia agus siúlóidí sna margaí? Cén fáth a raibh nach cuireadh síos dó aingeal ionas go mbeadh sé a bheith leis Warner?

trans-unit.source: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Nó [fáth nach] stór thíolacadh dó [ó neamh], nó a dhéanann sé [ní] bhfuil gairdín óna itheann sé? "Agus na agraíodh éagóiritheoirí feadh a rá," Níl Leanann tú ach fear tionchar ag draíochta. "

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Féach ar conas a bhuail siad ar do shon comparáidí;

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.
trans-unit.target: Is beannaithe té a, dá willed sé d'fhéadfadh, a bheith déanta duit [rud éigin] níos fearr ná sin - gairdíní faoi bhun a aibhneacha sreabhadh - agus d'fhéadfaí a dhéanamh ar do shon palaces.

trans-unit.source: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Ach tá siad Shéan an Uair, agus Táimid ag ullmhú le haghaidh iad siúd a dhiúltú an Uair a Blaze.

trans-unit.source: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.
trans-unit.target: Nuair a fheiceann an Hellfire iad ó áit i bhfad i gcéin, beidh siad a chloisteáil a Fury agus roaring.

trans-unit.source: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a chaitheamh isteach in áit caol cheangal ann i slabhraí, beidh siad caoin amach air sin lena ndíothú.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
trans-unit.target: [Beidh siad in iúl], "Ná caoin an lá lena ndíothú amháin ach caoin lena ndíothú i bhfad."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.
trans-unit.target: Abair, "An é sin níos fearr nó an Gairdín na Eternity atá geallta don righteous? Beidh sé dóibh ar luaíocht agus an ceann scríbe.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.
trans-unit.target: Chun iad a bhfuil ann is cuma cad is mian leo, [agus] géilliúil eternally.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"
trans-unit.target: Agus [lua] déanfaidh an Sé Lá bhailiú leo agus go bhfuil siad adhradh seachas Allah, agus beidh a rá, "An raibh tú amú seo, Mo seirbhísigh, nó rinne siad [féin] strae ó bhealach?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad ag rá, "exalted Tá tú! Ní raibh sé dúinn a ghlacadh seachas tú aon allies. Ach dá bhforáiltear tú compord dóibh agus a n-aithreacha dtí Forgot siad an teachtaireacht agus tháinig chun bheith ina daoine scriosta."

trans-unit.source: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, beidh siad dhiúltú tú, [disbelievers], in méid a deir tú, agus ní féidir leat a sheachaint [pionós] nó [aimsiú] cabhrú leat.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní raibh muid a sheoladh roimh tú, [O Muhammad], aon cheann de na teachtairí ach amháin gur ith siad bia agus shiúil sna margaí.

trans-unit.source: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd nach bhfuil ag súil leis an gcruinniú leis Us rá, "Cén fáth nach raibh aingil chuig síos dúinn, nó [cén fáth] dhéanaimid [Ní] féach ar ár dTiarna?"

trans-unit.source: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."
trans-unit.target: An lá a fheiceann siad na haingil - ní bheidh aon dtuairisc maith ann an lá sin do na coirpigh, agus [na haingil] a rá, "cosc agus inaccessible."

trans-unit.source: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh muid ag féachaint ar a bhfuil déanta acu gníomhais agus iad a dhéanamh mar deannaigh scaipthe.

trans-unit.source: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.
trans-unit.target: Na compánach an Paradise, go Lá, tá [i] socraíocht fearr agus níos fearr áit scíthe.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.
trans-unit.target: Agus [lua] an Lae nuair a bheidh an spéir scoilt oscailte le scamaill [ag teacht chun cinn], agus beidh na haingil a sheoladh síos glún i ndiaidh a.

trans-unit.source: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.
trans-unit.target: Is flaitheas True, is Lá, an chuid is mó trócaire.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.
trans-unit.target: Agus an Lae a bheidh an éagóiritheoir greim ar a lámha [i aiféala] beidh sé ag rá, "Oh, ba mhaith liom a thóg mé leis an Messenger bealach.

trans-unit.source: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.
trans-unit.target: Oh, mairg dom!

trans-unit.source: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."
trans-unit.target: Thug sé mé ar shiúl ó na gcuimhne iar dteacht i sé dom.

trans-unit.source: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."
trans-unit.target: Agus tá an Messenger dúirt sé, "O mo Thiarna, go deimhin, mo dhaoine bheith déanta seo Qur'an mar [rud] tréigthe."

trans-unit.source: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.
trans-unit.target: Agus dá bhrí sin ní mór déanta againn le haghaidh gach fáidh namhaid as líon na coirpigh.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a disbelieve rá, "Cén fáth nach raibh an Qur'an nochtadh dó go léir ag an am céanna?"

trans-unit.source: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil siad ag teacht a thabhairt duit le argóint amháin a thabhairt againn go mbainfidh tú an fhírinne agus an míniú is fearr.

trans-unit.source: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Na cinn atá bailíodh ar a n-aghaidh go dtí Ifreann - sin iad na measa i suíomh agus faide ar strae i [a] ar bhealach.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí muid tugtha cinnte Moses an Scrioptúr agus ceapadh leis a dheartháir Aaron mar chúntóir.

trans-unit.source: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: Agus dúirt muid, "Téigh bheirt agaibh do na daoine a bhfuil dhiúltú Ár comharthaí."

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Agus na daoine Noah - nuair a shéan siad na teachtairí, báite muid orthu, agus rinne muid iad don chine daonna comhartha.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.
trans-unit.target: Agus [scrios muid] 'AAD agus Thamud agus an compánach an maith agus glúnta atá go leor eatarthu.

trans-unit.source: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: Agus do gach láthair againn samplaí [mar rabhaidh], agus scrios gach Táimid le [iomlán] scriosadh.

trans-unit.source: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá siad ag teacht cheana féin ar an mbaile a bhí showered a le rain olc.

trans-unit.source: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a fheiceann siad tú, [O Muhammad], a ghlacann siad tú ach amháin i magadh, [ag rá], "An é seo an ceann a mbeidh Allah sheoladh mar theachtaire?

trans-unit.source: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.
trans-unit.target: Bheadh sé beagnach amú dúinn ónár déithe a bhí againn nach raibh an fód in [adhartha de] iad. "Ach tá siad ag dul go mbeadh a fhios, nuair a fheiceann siad an pionós, atá faide astray i [a] bhealach.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?
trans-unit.target: An bhfaca tú an ceann a ghlacann mar a dhia a mhian féin?

trans-unit.source: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Nó is dóigh leat go bhfuil éisteacht an chuid is mó acu nó chúis?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.
trans-unit.target: Bíodh nach tú a mheas do Thiarna - conas a leathnaíonn sé an scáth, agus más rud é willed sé, d'fhéadfadh sé a rinne sé Stationary?

trans-unit.source: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.
trans-unit.target: Ansin a shealbhú againn sé ar láimh do tuiscint gairid.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé té a rinne an oíche ar do shon mar éadaí agus codladh [bhealach chun] eile agus rinne an lá a resurrection.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé té a chuireann an gaotha mar tidings maith roimh a bhuanghrá, agus seol muid síos ón spéir uisce íon

trans-unit.source: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.
trans-unit.target: Gur féidir linn a thabhairt chun beatha an dóigh sin le talamh marbh agus a thabhairt dó mar deoch leis na hionstraimí a cruthaíodh muid beostoic iomadúla agus fir.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá muid a dháileadh cinnte é i measc iad go bhféadfadh siad a chur i gcuimhne, ach tá an chuid is mó de na daoine a dhiúltú ach amháin disbelief.

trans-unit.source: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.
trans-unit.target: Agus dá mbeadh willed againn, d'fhéadfadh muid a sheoladh isteach ngach cathair Warner.

trans-unit.source: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin ní féidir cloí leis na disbelievers, agus iarracht ina gcoinne leis an Qur'an ina iarraidh mór.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé té a scaoileadh [an am céanna] an dá farraigí, ceann úr agus milis agus ceann goirt amháin agus searbh, agus chuir sé eatarthu ina bhac agus laindéal thoirmeasc.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé té a chruthaigh ó uisce bheith ag an duine agus rinne sé [gaol ag] lineage agus pósadh.

trans-unit.source: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].
trans-unit.target: Ach siad adhradh seachas Allah nach bhfuil sochair dóibh féin nó dochar dóibh, agus is é an disbeliever riamh, i gcoinne a Thiarna, cúntóir [chun Satan].

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil muid a chuir tú, [O Muhammad], ach amháin mar bringer de dtuairisc maith agus Warner.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."
trans-unit.target: Abair, "Ní dóigh liom a iarraidh ar tú as é aon íocaíocht -. Ach go whoever uachtanna bhféadfadh ghlacadh a Thiarna ar bhealach"

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted -
trans-unit.target: Agus ag brath ar an or-maireachtála nach bhfuil bás, agus exalt [Allah] le a moladh.

trans-unit.source: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed.
trans-unit.target: An té a chruthaigh na spéartha agus an talamh agus a bhfuil eatarthu i sé lá agus ansin bhunaigh é féin os cionn an Throne - an chuid is mó trócaire, mar sin a iarraidh faoi Eisean amháin maith ar an eolas.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bheidh sé dúirt sé leo: "prostrate chun an chuid is mó trócaire," a deir siad, "Agus cad é an chuid is mó trócaire? Ba chóir dúinn a prostrate leis an gceann a ordaíonn tú dúinn?"

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
trans-unit.target: Is beannaithe sé a chuir i na réaltaí spéir mór agus a chur ann a [dhó] lampa agus gealach lonrúil.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé té a rinne an oíche agus an lá i ndiaidh a chéile le haghaidh whoever mian chun cuimhneamh nó a mian buíochas.

trans-unit.source: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,
trans-unit.target: Agus tá na seirbhísigh an Merciful an chuid is mó dóibh siúd a shiúlann ar an domhan go héasca, agus nuair a bheidh an seoladh ignorant iad [harshly], deir siad [focail] síochána,

trans-unit.source: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a chaitheann [cuid de] an oíche ar a prostrating Thiarna agus seasamh [i paidir]

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a rá, "Ár dTiarna, sheachaint ó dúinn an pionósú ifreann Go deimhin, tá a pionós cloí riamh.;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé olc mar lonnaíocht agus cónaithe. "

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate
trans-unit.target: Agus [tá siad] na daoine, nuair a chaitheann siad, é sin a ní excessively nó go spárálach ach bhí riamh, idir, [cóir] measartha

trans-unit.source: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd nach bhfuil a agairt le Allah deity eile nó a mharú an anam a Allah forbidden [a bheith maraithe], ach amháin trí cheart, agus nach ndéanfaidh siad caidreamh collaí neamhdhleathach.

trans-unit.source: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -
trans-unit.target: Iolrú dó go bhfuil an pionós ar an Lá na Aiséirí, agus beidh sé cloí uiríslithe ann -

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin dóibh siúd a repent, creidim agus obair righteous.

trans-unit.source: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.
trans-unit.target: Agus an té a repents agus a dhéanann a dhéanann righteousness cas go deimhin chun Allah le [nglactar] aithrí.

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.
trans-unit.target: Agus [tá siad] siúd nach bhfuil fianaise a falsehood, agus nuair a théann siad in aice urlabhra tinn, a théann siad ag le dínit.

trans-unit.source: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a, nuair a gcuimhne ar na véarsaí a Thiarna, ní thagann siad orthu bodhar agus dall.

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a rá, "Ár dTiarna, tabhair duinn as measc ár mná céile agus compord sliocht lenár súile agus a dhéanamh linn mar shampla le haghaidh an righteous."

trans-unit.source: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad sin bronnadh Seomra cad endured siad foighneach, agus beidh siad a bheith faighte ann le beannachtaí agus [focail] síochána.

trans-unit.source: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.
trans-unit.target: Cloí eternally ann.

trans-unit.source: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.
trans-unit.target: Abair, "Cad ba mhaith mo chúram Thiarna duit más rud é nach do supplication?"

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ta, Le feiceáil, Meem.

trans-unit.source: These are the verses of the clear Book.
trans-unit.target: Is iad seo na véarsaí an Leabhar soiléir.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
trans-unit.target: B'fhéidir, [O Muhammad], ba mhaith leat tú féin a mharú le grief nach mbeidh siad believers.

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
trans-unit.target: Má willed muid, d'fhéadfadh muid a sheoladh síos dóibh as an spéir comhartha a mbeadh a necks fós humbled.

trans-unit.source: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
trans-unit.target: Agus a thagann aon revelation dóibh as an nua as an chuid is mó trócaire ach amháin go téann siad amach as é.

trans-unit.source: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Do bhfuil siad Shéan cheana féin, ach beidh teacht chucu an nuacht ar a d'úsáid siad chun magadh.

trans-unit.source: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
trans-unit.target: An raibh siad ag féachaint ar an domhain - cé mhéad againn a tháirgtear ann ó gach sórt uasal?

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil comhartha, ach is mó acu a bhí gan a bheith creidimh.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
trans-unit.target: Agus [lua] nuair a d'iarr do Thiarna Moses, [ag rá], "Téigh go dtí na daoine wrongdoing -

trans-unit.source: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
trans-unit.target: Muintir Pharaoh.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Mo Thiarna, go deimhin, eagla orm go mbeidh siad dhiúltú dom

trans-unit.source: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.
trans-unit.target: Agus go mbeidh mo chléibh doichte agus ní bheidh mo theanga a bheith líofa, mar sin seol do Aaron.

trans-unit.source: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
trans-unit.target: Agus tá siad ar dom [éileamh mar gheall ar] pheaca, ionas eagla orm go mbeidh siad tú a mharú dom. "

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] dúirt sé, "Uimh Téigh bheirt agaibh le Ár comharthaí; go deimhin, Tá muid in éineacht leat, ag éisteacht.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Téigh go dtí Pharaoh agus a rá, 'Tá muid ar an teachtairí an Tiarna de na saol,

trans-unit.source: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
trans-unit.target: [Ordaítear a rá], "Seol linn na Leanaí ar Iosrael." ""

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] dúirt sé, "Ní raibh a muid ag ardú tú inár measc mar leanbh, agus d'fhan tú i measc dúinn ar feadh na mblianta de do shaol?

trans-unit.source: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
trans-unit.target: Agus [ansin] rinne tú do gníomhas a rinne tú, agus a bhí tú ar an ungrateful. "

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
trans-unit.target: [Maois] dúirt sé, "Rinne mé é, ansin, nuair a bhí mé ar sin ar strae.

trans-unit.source: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, theith mé uait nuair a bhí imní agam duit.

trans-unit.source: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé seo le bhfabhar bhfuil tú i gcuimhne dom -? Go bhfuil tú sclábhaithe na Leanaí ar Iosrael "

trans-unit.source: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"
trans-unit.target: Dúirt Pharaoh, "Agus cad é an Tiarna de na saol?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
trans-unit.target: [Maois] dúirt sé, "An Tiarna na flaithis agus talamh agus go bhfuil idir iad, má ba chóir duit a bheith cinnte."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
trans-unit.target: Dúirt [Pharaoh] leis na timpeall air, "An bhfuil tú nach bhfuil a chloisteáil?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
trans-unit.target: [Maois] dúirt sé, "Do Thiarna agus an Tiarna do chéad sinnsear."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] dúirt sé, "Go deimhin, tá do 'teachtaire' a bhí sheoladh chugat mheabhair."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
trans-unit.target: [Maois] dúirt sé, "Tiarna na thoir agus an taobh thiar agus go bhfuil idir iad, má bhí tú le ciall."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] dúirt sé, "Má ghlacann tú le dia eile seachas dom, beidh mé áit surely tú i measc iad siúd i bpríosún."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
trans-unit.target: [Maois] dúirt sé, "Fiú má thug mé tú léiriú cruthúnas?"

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] dúirt sé, "Ansin a thabhairt, má ba chóir duit a bheith ar an fíor."

trans-unit.source: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, [Maois] threw a fhoireann, agus go tobann go raibh sé ina léiriú nathair.

trans-unit.source: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.
trans-unit.target: Agus tharraing sé amach a lámh;

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt [Pharaoh] leis na cinn eminent timpeall air, "Go deimhin, tá sé seo le magician fhoghlaim.

trans-unit.source: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"
trans-unit.target: Tá sé ag iarraidh a thiomáint tú as do thalamh ag a draíochta, mar sin cad a dhéanann tú comhairle a? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Siar [an t-ábhar ar] dó agus a dheartháir agus a sheoladh i measc na bailitheoirí cathracha

trans-unit.source: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
trans-unit.target: Cé a bheidh a thabhairt duit gach foghlaimíodh, magician oilte. "

trans-unit.source: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, bhí le chéile na magicians maidir le ceapadh an lae-aitheanta go maith.

trans-unit.source: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí sé sin do na daoine, "An mbeidh tú congregate

trans-unit.source: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
trans-unit.target: Go bhféadfaimis a leanúint na magicians má tá siad an ceannasach? "

trans-unit.source: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a tháinig an magicians, dúirt siad go Pharaoh, "An bhfuil go deimhin, dúinn ar luaíocht má táimid an ceannasach?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Tá, agus go deimhin, beidh tú ansin na ndaoine in aice [dom]."

trans-unit.source: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
trans-unit.target: Moses dúirt sé leo: "Caith cuma cad a bheidh tú caith."

trans-unit.source: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, chaith siad a gcuid rópaí agus a bhfoirne agus dúirt sé, "De réir an bhféadfadh Pharaoh, go deimhin, tá sé againn atá ceannasach."

trans-unit.source: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.
trans-unit.target: Ansin chaith Moses a fhoireann, agus ag an am céanna devoured sé cad falsaithe siad.

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, thit na magicians síos in faonluí [chun Allah].

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Táimid tar éis a chreid sa Tiarna de na saol,

trans-unit.source: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
trans-unit.target: An Tiarna na Moses agus Aaron. "

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] dúirt sé, "chreid tú Moses sular thug mé tú cead. Go deimhin, tá sé do cheannaire a bhfuil múinte draíocht tú, ach tá tú ag dul a fháil amach. Beidh mé a ghearradh surely a bhaint de do lámha agus do chosa ar an taobh thall, agus mé

trans-unit.source: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Níl díobháil. Go deimhin, go dtí ár dTiarna beimid ar ais.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is mian linn go mbeidh ár dTiarna maith dúinn ár bpeacaí toisc go raibh muid an chéad cheann de na believers. "

trans-unit.source: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."
trans-unit.target: Agus spreag muid le Moses, "Taisteal san oíche le mo sheirbhísigh; go deimhin, beidh tú a shaothrú."

trans-unit.source: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Ansin chuir Pharaoh i measc na bailitheoirí cathracha

trans-unit.source: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,
trans-unit.target: [Agus dúirt], "Go deimhin, tá na ach banna beag,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they are enraging us,
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, tá siad enraging linn,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, tá muid ag sochaí aireach ... "

trans-unit.source: So We removed them from gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, a bhaint muid iad ó gairdíní agus spriongaí

trans-unit.source: And treasures and honorable station -
trans-unit.target: Agus seoda agus stáisiún onórach -

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.
trans-unit.target: Dá bhrí sin.

trans-unit.source: So they pursued them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, lean siad orthu ag éirí gréine.

trans-unit.source: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"
trans-unit.target: Agus mar do chonnairc an dá chuideachta a chéile, an compánach na Moses dúirt sé, "Go deimhin, tá muid a bheith overtaken!"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."
trans-unit.target: [Maois] dúirt sé, "No Go deimhin, liom go bhfuil mo Thiarna;! Beidh sé Treoraí sé mé."

trans-unit.source: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.
trans-unit.target: Ansin spreag muid le Moses, "Stailc le do bhaill foirne an fharraige," agus parted sí, agus bhí gach cuid cosúil le sliabh towering mór.

trans-unit.source: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.
trans-unit.target: Agus dul chun cinn againn léi na pursuers.

trans-unit.source: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
trans-unit.target: Agus a shábháil muid Moses agus iad siúd leis, go léir le chéile.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned the others.
trans-unit.target: Ansin báite muid na cinn eile.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil comhartha, ach is mó acu a bhí gan a bheith creidimh.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the news of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Agus aithris dóibh an nuacht Abraham,

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"
trans-unit.target: Nuair a dúirt sé lena athair agus a mhuintir, "Cad a dhéanann tú ag adhradh?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "adhradh againn idols agus fanacht leo dírithe."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "An bhfuil siad éisteacht leat nuair supplicate agat?

trans-unit.source: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"
trans-unit.target: Nó an bhfuil siad tairbhe duit, nó an bhfuil dochar siad? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Ach fuair muid ár n-aithreacha a dhéanamh dá bhrí sin."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Ansin a dhéanann tú a fheiceáil cad tá tú adhradh,

trans-unit.source: You and your ancient forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Tú féin agus do sinnsear ársa?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá siad naimhde dom, ach amháin an Tiarna de na saol,

trans-unit.source: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.
trans-unit.target: Cé a chruthaigh mé, agus sé [is a] treoracha dom.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé té a Fothaí dom agus a thugann dom deoch.

trans-unit.source: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a tá mé tinn, tá sé té a leigheas dom

trans-unit.source: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh a chur faoi deara dom a bás agus ansin dom a thabhairt ar an saol

trans-unit.source: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: Agus a bhfuil ag iarraidh go mbeidh sé logh dom mo pheaca ar an Lá na Recompense. "

trans-unit.source: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
trans-unit.target: [Agus dúirt sé], "Mo Thiarna, a dheonú dom údarás agus éineacht liom leis an righteous.

trans-unit.source: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
trans-unit.target: Agus deontas dom cáil onóra i measc glúnta atá níos déanaí.

trans-unit.source: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Agus áit dom i measc na inheritors an Gairdín na pléisiúir.

trans-unit.source: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
trans-unit.target: Agus maith m'athair.

trans-unit.source: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
trans-unit.target: Agus ná náire dom ar an Lá siad [fad] resurrected -

trans-unit.source: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children
trans-unit.target: An Lá nuair nach mbeidh tairbhe [aon duine] saibhreas nó leanaí

trans-unit.source: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin duine a thagann chun Allah le croí fuaim. "

trans-unit.source: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh Paradise a thabhairt in aice [Lá sin] leis an righteous.

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh Hellfire a thabhairt amach do na deviators,

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh sé a rá leo: "Cá bhfuil na d'úsáid tú chun adhradh

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"
trans-unit.target: Seachas Allah?

trans-unit.source: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, beidh siad a dhiúltaigh Hellfire isteach, siad agus na deviators

trans-unit.source: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.
trans-unit.target: Agus na saighdiúirí na Iblees, go léir le chéile.

trans-unit.source: They will say while they dispute therein,
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad ag rá cé go díospóid bhfo-alt sin,

trans-unit.source: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
trans-unit.target: "De réir Allah, bhí muid go deimhin i earráid fhollasach

trans-unit.source: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Nuair ionann tusa leis an Tiarna de na saol.

trans-unit.source: And no one misguided us except the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Agus gan aon duine misguided dúinn ach amháin an coirpigh.

trans-unit.source: So now we have no intercessors
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, anois ní mór dúinn aon intercessors

trans-unit.source: And not a devoted friend.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach cara dírithe.

trans-unit.source: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "
trans-unit.target: Ansin má bhí againn ach ar ais [don domhan] agus d'fhéadfadh a bheith ar na creidimh ... "

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil comhartha, ach is mó acu a bhí gan a bheith creidimh.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Na daoine Noah Shéan na teachtairí

trans-unit.source: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Nuair a dúirt a dheartháir Noah leo: "An mbeidh tú eagla Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá mé duit teachtaire trustworthy.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní féidir liom a iarraidh ort le haghaidh é aon íocaíocht.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me."
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Ar chóir dúinn chreideann tú agus tú leanúint ag an [aicme daoine] is ísle?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Agus cad é is eol dom an méid a bhain siad úsáid as a dhéanamh?

trans-unit.source: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.
trans-unit.target: Is é an cuntas amháin ar mo Thiarna, dá [fhéadfaí] tú bhrath.

trans-unit.source: And I am not one to drive away the believers.
trans-unit.target: Agus níl mé amháin a thiomáint ar shiúl na believers.

trans-unit.source: I am only a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Tá mé ach Warner soiléir. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Mura bhfuil tú ag scor, O Noah, beidh tú a bheith cinnte de na daoine atá stoned."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Mo Thiarna, go deimhin, tá mo dhaoine diúltaíodh dom.

trans-unit.source: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
trans-unit.target: Ansin breithiúnas idir mé agus iad le breithiúnas cinntitheach agus a shábháil dom agus iad siúd liom na believers. "

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, a shábháil muid air agus iad siúd a bhfuil sé ar an long ualaithe.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.
trans-unit.target: Ansin báite muid ina dhiaidh sin na cinn eile.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil comhartha, ach is mó acu a bhí gan a bheith creidimh.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: 'Shéan AAD na teachtairí

trans-unit.source: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Nuair a dúirt a dheartháir HUD leo: "An mbeidh tú eagla Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá mé duit teachtaire trustworthy.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní féidir liom a iarraidh ort le haghaidh é aon íocaíocht.

trans-unit.source: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil tú a thógáil ar gach ingearchló comhartha, díbh féin amusing,

trans-unit.source: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?
trans-unit.target: Agus a ghlacadh le haghaidh palaces díbh féin agus fortresses a d'fhéadfá a cloí eternally?

trans-unit.source: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a stailc tú, stailc tú mar tyrants.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,
trans-unit.target: Agus eagla Sé a chuir tú leis sin a fhios agat,

trans-unit.source: Provided you with grazing livestock and children
trans-unit.target: Ar choinníoll tú le beostoc féaraigh agus leanaí

trans-unit.source: And gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: Agus gairdíní agus spriongaí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, eagla mé duit a phionósú lá uafásach. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Tá sé ar fad mar an gcéanna a chur chugainn an bhfuil tú comhairle nó nach bhfuil na comhairleoirí.

trans-unit.source: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: Ní hé seo ach saincheaptha ar an iar- pobail,

trans-unit.source: And we are not to be punished."
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil muid a phionósú. "

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Agus shéan siad air, agus mar sin scrios muid iad.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Thamud Shéan na teachtairí

trans-unit.source: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Nuair a dúirt a dheartháir Salih leo: "An mbeidh tú eagla Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá mé duit teachtaire trustworthy.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní féidir liom a iarraidh ort le haghaidh é aon íocaíocht.

trans-unit.source: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],
trans-unit.target: An mbeidh tú a fhágáil i méid atá anseo, slán [ó bhás],

trans-unit.source: Within gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: Laistigh gairdíní agus spriongaí

trans-unit.source: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?
trans-unit.target: Agus réimsí de barra agus crainn pailme le torthaí softened?

trans-unit.source: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.
trans-unit.target: Agus carve tú amach as na sléibhte, tithe, le scil.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
trans-unit.target: Agus ná obey an t-ordú na transgressors,

trans-unit.source: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
trans-unit.target: A chur faoi deara éilliú sa talamh agus nach a leasú. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Tá tú ach ar siúd atá faoi draíocht.

trans-unit.source: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Tá tú ach a fear cosúil dúinn féin, mar sin a thabhairt comhartha, má ba chóir duit a bheith ar an fíor. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Is é seo an sí-camel. Óir is di [am a] deoch, agus le haghaidh bhfuil tú [am a] deoch, [gach] ar lá ar a dtugtar.

trans-unit.source: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
trans-unit.target: Agus nach mbaineann sí le díobháil, lest tú a urghabháil ag an pionósú lá uafásach. "

trans-unit.source: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
trans-unit.target: Ach hamstrung siad di agus mar sin bhí regretful.

trans-unit.source: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Agus ghabh an pionós orthu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Muintir Lot Shéan na teachtairí

trans-unit.source: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Nuair a dúirt a dheartháir Lot leo: "An mbeidh tú eagla Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá mé duit teachtaire trustworthy.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní féidir liom a iarraidh ort le haghaidh é aon íocaíocht.

trans-unit.source: Do you approach males among the worlds
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil tú ag cur chuige fireannaigh i measc an saol

trans-unit.source: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."
trans-unit.target: Agus fág ar a bhfuil do Thiarna a cruthaíodh le haghaidh tú mar mates?

trans-unit.source: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Mura bhfuil tú ag scor, O Lot, beidh tú a bheith cinnte de na daoine díshealbhaíodh."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Go deimhin, tá mé, i dtreo do ghníomhas, de na daoine a detest [é].

trans-unit.source: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
trans-unit.target: Mo Thiarna, ach amháin dom agus mo theaghlach ó [an iarmhairt] cad a dhéanann siad. "

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and his family, all,
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, a shábháil muid féin agus a theaghlaigh, ar fad,

trans-unit.source: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin seanbhean i measc iad siúd a d'fhan taobh thiar de.

trans-unit.source: Then We destroyed the others.
trans-unit.target: Ansin scrios muid na cinn eile.

trans-unit.source: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: Agus cur fearthainne i rith muid orthu báisteach [clocha], agus bhí olc an bháisteach na ndaoine a bhí rabhadh a.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil comhartha, ach is mó acu a bhí gan a bheith creidimh.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: An compánach an mothar Shéan na teachtairí

trans-unit.source: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Nuair a dúirt Shu'ayb leo: "An mbeidh tú eagla Allah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá mé duit teachtaire trustworthy.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, eagla Allah agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní féidir liom a iarraidh ort le haghaidh é aon íocaíocht.

trans-unit.source: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Tabhair beart iomlán agus ná bí de na daoine a chur faoi deara caillteanais.

trans-unit.source: And weigh with an even balance.
trans-unit.target: Agus meáigh le cothromaíocht fiú.

trans-unit.source: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil daoine ar a n-dlite bhainfaidh agus nach ndéanfaidh siad mí-úsáid ar an talamh, leathadh éilliú.

trans-unit.source: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
trans-unit.target: Agus eagla Sé a chruthaigh tú, agus an cruthú iar-. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Tá tú ach ar siúd atá faoi draíocht.

trans-unit.source: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
trans-unit.target: Tá tú ach a fear cosúil dúinn féin, agus go deimhin, is dóigh linn go bhfuil tú i measc na liars.

trans-unit.source: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, a chur faoi deara titim ar dúinn blúirí ar an spéir, má ba chóir duit a bheith ar an fíor. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Is é mo Thiarna is a fhios agam cad a dhéanann tú."

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
trans-unit.target: Agus shéan siad air, agus mar sin an pionós de lá an scamall dubh urghabhadh iad.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil comhartha, ach is mó acu a bhí gan a bheith creidimh.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, do Thiarna - Tá sé an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaireach.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, is é an Qur'an nochtadh an Tiarna de na saol.

trans-unit.source: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
trans-unit.target: Tá an Spiorad Tairiseach thug sé síos

trans-unit.source: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -
trans-unit.target: Ar do chroí, [O Muhammad] - gur féidir leat a bheith ar na warners -

trans-unit.source: In a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: Ar bhealach soiléir Araibis teanga.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, tá sé [luaidhtear] sna scrioptúir iar bpobal.

trans-unit.source: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?
trans-unit.target: Agus ní raibh sé comhartha dóibh go bhfuil sé aitheanta ag na scoláirí ar na Leanaí ar Iosrael?

trans-unit.source: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners
trans-unit.target: Agus fiú dá mbeadh fios linn é ceann i measc na Gaill

trans-unit.source: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí aithris sé sé dóibh [breá], bheadh siad [fós] nach raibh creidimh ann.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Dá bhrí sin tá Chuir muid disbelief i gcroí na coirpigh.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ní bheidh siad chreideann ann go dtí go bhfeiceann siad an pionós painful.

trans-unit.source: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh sé teacht chucu go tobann agus a bhraitheann siad [é] nach bhfuil.

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh siad ag rá, "Is féidir linn a reprieved?"

trans-unit.source: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, as ár phionós atá siad impatient?

trans-unit.source: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
trans-unit.target: Ansin tá tú a mheas má thug muid iad taitneamh ar feadh na mblianta

trans-unit.source: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
trans-unit.target: Agus ansin tháinig dóibh go a raibh siad geallta?

trans-unit.source: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
trans-unit.target: Ní bheadh siad leas a bhaint as ag an taitneamh a bhaint le chuici a tugadh iad.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
trans-unit.target: Agus ní raibh muid scriosann aon chathair ach amháin go raibh sé warners

trans-unit.source: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.
trans-unit.target: Mar i gcuimhne;

trans-unit.source: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil an diabhal a thug an revelation síos.

trans-unit.source: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
trans-unit.target: Níl sé cheadaítear dóibh, ná go mbeadh siad in ann.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin siad, ó [a] éisteachta, a bhaint astu.

trans-unit.source: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
trans-unit.target: Ní sin a dhéanamh agairt le Allah deity eile agus [rud] i measc na phionósú.

trans-unit.source: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
trans-unit.target: Agus rabhadh, [O Muhammad], d'gaire den tsamhail chéanna.

trans-unit.source: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
trans-unit.target: Agus níos ísle do sciathán dóibh siúd a leanann tú na believers.

trans-unit.source: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
trans-unit.target: Agus má disobey siad tú, a rá ansin, "Go deimhin, tá mé disassociated as an méid atá á dhéanamh agat."

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: Agus ag brath ar an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an trócaire,

trans-unit.source: Who sees you when you arise
trans-unit.target: A fheiceann tú nuair a thagann tú

trans-unit.source: And your movement among those who prostrate.
trans-unit.target: Agus do ghluaiseacht i measc iad siúd prostrate.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé an Éisteacht, an fhios agam.

trans-unit.source: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
trans-unit.target: Cuirfidh mé in iúl duit ar ar na diabhal descend?

trans-unit.source: They descend upon every sinful liar.
trans-unit.target: téigh síos siad ar gach liar sinful.

trans-unit.source: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.
trans-unit.target: pas siad ar an méid atá cloiste, agus is mó acu liars.

trans-unit.source: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
trans-unit.target: Agus na filí - [amháin] na deviators leanúint leo;

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
trans-unit.target: nach bhfeiceann tú go bhfuil i ngach ngleann roam siad

trans-unit.source: And that they say what they do not do? -
trans-unit.target: Agus sin a deir siad cad nach bhfuil siad a dhéanamh?

trans-unit.source: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin iad siúd [filí] a chreideann agus a dhéanann gníomhais righteous agus cuimhnigh Allah minic agus a chosaint [Moslamaigh] tar éis dóibh éagóir.

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a clear Book
trans-unit.target: Ta, Seen.

trans-unit.source: As guidance and good tidings for the believers
trans-unit.target: Mar treoir agus tidings maith do na creidimh

trans-unit.source: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Cé bhunú urnaí agus a thabhairt zakah, agus na dhiaidh go bhfuil siad áirithe [mheon].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, dóibh siúd nach bhfuil a chreideann sa dhiaidh, Déanta againn taitneamhach dóibh a gcuid gníomhais, agus mar sin siad wander blindly.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: Sin iad na cinn a bhfuil a bheidh ann an ceann is measa de phionóis, agus an dá ngairtear go bhfuil siad na losers mó.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [O Muhammad], you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, [O Muhammad], gheobhaidh tú an Qur'an ó cheann Wise agus Thoil.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when Moses said to his family, "Indeed, I have perceived a fire. I will bring you from there information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves."
trans-unit.target: [Luaigh] nuair a dúirt Moses a chlann, "Go deimhin, tá mé a bhraitear tine. Beidh mé a thabhairt duit ó ann eolais nó beidh a thabhairt duit tóirse a dhó gur féidir leat te díbh féin."

trans-unit.source: But when he came to it, he was called, "Blessed is whoever is at the fire and whoever is around it. And exalted is Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Ach nuair a tháinig sé chuige, bhí ar a dtugtar é, "Is beannaithe whoever ag an tine agus whoever is timpeall air. Agus exalted Is Allah, Tiarna na saol.

trans-unit.source: O Moses, indeed it is I - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: O Moses, go deimhin, tá sé I -. Allah, an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an Wise "

trans-unit.source: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear.
trans-unit.target: Agus [dúradh leis], "Caith síos do bhaill foirne."

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, he who wrongs, then substitutes good after evil - indeed, I am Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Seachas sin, an té a wrongs, Hionadaigh ansin maith tar éis olc - go deimhin, tá mé forgiving agus trócaire.

trans-unit.source: And put your hand into the opening of your garment [at the breast]; it will come out white without disease. [These are] among the nine signs [you will take] to Pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."
trans-unit.target: Agus cuir do lámh isteach sa oscailt do éadaigh [ag an chíche];

trans-unit.source: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Ach nuair a tháinig chucu Ár comharthaí le feiceáil, a dúirt siad, "Tá an draíocht soiléir."

trans-unit.source: And they rejected them, while their [inner] selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters.
trans-unit.target: Agus dhiúltaigh siad iad, cé go raibh a gcuid [istigh] selves cinnte de, as éagóir agus haughtiness.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí muid tugtha cinnte le David agus eolas Sholamón, agus dúirt siad, "[mar gheall] Moladh Allah, a bhfuil bail ar fónamh orthu dúinn thar go leor de chuid seirbhíseach chreidiúint."

trans-unit.source: And Solomon inherited David. He said, "O people, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given from all things. Indeed, this is evident bounty."
trans-unit.target: Agus bhfuair Solamh David.

trans-unit.source: And gathered for Solomon were his soldiers of the jinn and men and birds, and they were [marching] in rows.
trans-unit.target: Agus a bailíodh le haghaidh Solamh raibh a chuid saighdiúirí ar an jinn agus fir agus éin, agus bhí siad [máirseáil] i sraitheanna.

trans-unit.source: Until, when they came upon the valley of the ants, an ant said, "O ants, enter your dwellings that you not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers while they perceive not."
trans-unit.target: Go dtí, nuair a tháinig siad ar an ghleann na seangáin, dúirt bhain seangán, "O seangáin, cuir isteach d'áiteanna cónaithe nach tú a bheith brúite ag Sholamón agus a chuid saighdiúirí cé nach bhraitheann siad."

trans-unit.source: So [Solomon] smiled, amused at her speech, and said, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants."
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, [Sholamón] aoibh, amused ar a chaint, agus dúirt sé, "Mo Thiarna, ar chumas dom a bheith buíoch as do dtús báire a Tá tú bestowed dom agus ar mo thuismitheoirí agus righteousness a cheadaíonn duit a dhéanamh. Agus a ligean isteach mé ag Do

trans-unit.source: And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent?
trans-unit.target: Agus thóg sé freastal ar na héin agus dúirt sé, "Cén fáth a bhfuil mé a fheiceáil ar an hoopoe - nó go bhfuil sé i measc na láthair?

trans-unit.source: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization."
trans-unit.target: Beidh mé a phionósú surely dó le pionós dian nó marú murab thugann sé dom údarú soiléir. "

trans-unit.source: But the hoopoe stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed [in knowledge] that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news.
trans-unit.target: Ach ní d'fhan an hoopoe fada agus dúirt sé, "Tá mé Chuimsigh [in eolas] go nach bhfuil tú cuimsithe, agus mé ag teacht chugat ó Sheba le nuacht áirithe.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, fuair mé [ann] bean rialú orthu, agus tá sí tugtha de gach rud, agus tá sí throne mór.

trans-unit.source: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from [His] way, so they are not guided,
trans-unit.target: fuair mé léi agus a muintir prostrating an ghrian ionad Allah, agus Satan déanta a n-gníomhais taitneamhach dóibh agus seachnaíodh iad ó [A] bhealach, mar sin nach bhfuil siad faoi threoir,

trans-unit.source: [And] so they do not prostrate to Allah, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare -
trans-unit.target: [Agus] sin nach bhfuil siad prostrate a Allah, a thugann amach an méid atá i bhfolach laistigh de na spéartha agus an talamh agus a fhios cad cheilt tú, agus cad a dhearbhú tú -

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."
trans-unit.target: Allah - níl aon deity ach amháin Eisean, Tiarna na Throne Mór ".

trans-unit.source: [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars.
trans-unit.target: [Sholamón] dúirt sé, "Beidh le feiceáil an raibh tú fíor nó go raibh na liars.

trans-unit.source: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return."
trans-unit.target: Tóg an litir mianach agus é a sheachadadh orthu.

trans-unit.source: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sí, "O cinn eminent, go deimhin, go bhfuil mé gur seachadadh litir uasal.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé ó Solomon, agus go deimhin, léann sé: 'In ainm an Allah, an trócaire hiomlán, an trócaireach Go háirithe,

trans-unit.source: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims].' "
trans-unit.target: Bí haughty liom ach a thagann chugam in aighneacht [mar Muslims]. '

trans-unit.source: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness [for] me."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sí, "cinn O eminent, comhairle a thabhairt dom mo affair. Ní ba mhaith liom a chinneadh ábhar go dtí go tú ag finné [do] dom."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Táimid fir neart agus de d'fhéadfadh míleata go hiontach, ach tá an t-ordú mise, mar sin a fheiceáil cad a bheidh tú ag ordú."

trans-unit.source: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sí, "Go deimhin Rithe - a dteacht cathair, ruin siad é agus a sholáthar ar an onóir a muintir humbled Agus dá bhrí sin a dhéanann siad..

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what [reply] the messengers will return."
trans-unit.target: Ach go deimhin, beidh mé a sheoladh chuig dóibh le bronntanas agus féach leis an méid [freagra] Beidh na teachtairí ar ais. "

trans-unit.source: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, nuair a tháinig siad go dtí Sholamón, a dúirt sé, "An bhfuil tú ar fáil dom le saibhreas? Ach cad Allah thug mé níos fearr ná an méid a thug sé leat. Ina ionad sin, tá sé tú a rejoice i do bhronntanas.

trans-unit.source: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased."
trans-unit.target: Fill ar ais dóibh, le haghaidh beidh muid ag teacht surely dóibh le saighdiúirí go mbeidh siad powerless a bhíonn, agus beidh muid ag dhíbirt surely iad sin a onnmhairiú i náiriú, agus beidh siad debased. "

trans-unit.source: [Solomon] said, "O assembly [of jinn], which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"
trans-unit.target: [Sholamón] dúirt sé, "O cóimeáil [de jinn], cé acu de tú a thabhairt dom a ríchathaoir sula dtagann siad chugam in aighneacht?"

trans-unit.source: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this [task] strong and trustworthy."
trans-unit.target: A ceann cumhachtach as measc na jinn dúirt sé, "beidh mé é a thabhairt chun tú sula tú ag ardú ó d'áit, agus go deimhin, tá mé ar an [tasc] láidir agus iontaofa."

trans-unit.source: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt duine a raibh eolas ón Scrioptúr, "Beidh mé é a thabhairt duit roimh do thuairisceáin Sracfhéachaint thabhairt duit."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided [to truth] or will be of those who is not guided."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Disguise as a cuid a ríchathaoir; feicfimid cé acu an ndéanfaidh sí a threorú [chun fírinne] nó a bheidh siúd nach bhfuil a threoraigh."

trans-unit.source: So when she arrived, it was said [to her], "Is your throne like this?" She said, "[It is] as though it was it." [Solomon said], "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims [in submission to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, nuair a tháinig sí, bhí sé sin [léi], "An bhfuil do ríchathaoir mar seo?"

trans-unit.source: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: Agus go a raibh sí ag adhradh seachas Allah a bhí averted di [ó bhráid Eisean].

trans-unit.source: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins [to wade through]. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace [whose floor is] made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah, Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Dúradh léi, "Cuir isteach an Pálás."

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent to Thamud their brother Salih, [saying], "Worship Allah," and at once they were two parties conflicting.
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí muid a sheoladh cinnte Thamud a dheartháir Salih, [ag rá], "Adhartha Allah," agus ag an am céanna a bhí siad dhá pháirtí salach.

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil instead of good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of Allah that you may receive mercy?"
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "O mo mhuintir, cén fáth a bhfuil tú impatient chun olc in áit go maith? Cén fáth nach bhfuil tú a lorg maithiúnas na Allah gur féidir leat a fháil déan trócaire?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We consider you a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen is with Allah. Rather, you are a people being tested."
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Is dóigh linn tú omen olc, tú, agus iad siúd a bhfuil tú."

trans-unit.source: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending [its affairs].
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí sa chathair naoi cinnirí teaghlaigh is cúis éilliú sa talamh agus ní leasú [cuid gnóthaí].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Take a mutual oath by Allah that we will kill him by night, he and his family. Then we will say to his executor, 'We did not witness the destruction of his family, and indeed, we are truthful.' "
trans-unit.target: Dúirt siad, "Tóg mhionn frithpháirteach ó Allah go mbeidh muid ag mharú dó san oíche, sé féin agus a theaghlach. Ansin, beidh muid ag rá lena seiceadóir, 'Ní raibh muid finné an scrios a theaghlaigh, agus go deimhin, tá muid fíor.'

trans-unit.source: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.
trans-unit.target: Agus bheartaigh siad plean, agus Phleanálamar plean, cé nach bhraitear siad.

trans-unit.source: Then look how was the outcome of their plan - that We destroyed them and their people, all.
trans-unit.target: Ansin breathnú ar conas a bhí an toradh a bplean - go scriosadh muid iad agus a n-daoine, go léir.

trans-unit.source: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they had done. Indeed in that is a sign for people who know.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, tá na n-tithe, desolate mar gheall ar an mícheart bhí déanta acu.

trans-unit.source: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: Agus a shábháil muid iad siúd a chreid agus a úsáidtear chun eagla Allah.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing?
trans-unit.target: Agus [lua] Lot, nuair a dúirt sé a chuid daoine, "An bhfuil tú tiomanta immorality agus tú ag féachaint ar?

trans-unit.source: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly."
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil tú cur chuige go deimhin fir a bhfuil fonn in áit na mban?

trans-unit.source: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure."
