trans-unit.target: Ar an Lá beidh an spéir a bheith cosúil le hola murky,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool,
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh na sléibhte a bheith cosúil le olann,

trans-unit.source: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh aon chara a iarraidh [rud ar bith de] cara,

trans-unit.source: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad a thaispeáint dá chéile.

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his brother
trans-unit.target: Agus a bhean chéile agus a dheartháir

trans-unit.source: And his nearest kindred who shelter him
trans-unit.target: Agus a gaire den tsamhail chéanna le a fothain air

trans-unit.source: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.
trans-unit.target: Agus is cuma cé ar domhan go hiomlán [sin] ansin a shábháil dó.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: A remover of exteriors.
trans-unit.target: Tá remover de taobh amuigh.

trans-unit.source: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]
trans-unit.target: Iarrann é an té a iompú a dhroim [ar fhírinne] agus d'imigh [ó obedience]

trans-unit.source: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.
trans-unit.target: Agus a bailíodh [saibhreas] agus hoarded.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, bhí cine daonna a cruthaíodh fonn:

trans-unit.source: When evil touches him, impatient,
trans-unit.target: Nuair baint olc air, impatient,

trans-unit.source: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair baint maith air, a choinneáil siar [di],

trans-unit.source: Except the observers of prayer -
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin na breathnóirí paidir -

trans-unit.source: Those who are constant in their prayer
trans-unit.target: Iad siúd a bhfuil i gcónaí ina n-urnaí

trans-unit.source: And those within whose wealth is a known right
trans-unit.target: Agus is é sin laistigh dá saibhreas ceart ar eolas

trans-unit.source: For the petitioner and the deprived -
trans-unit.target: Le haghaidh an achainígh agus a bhaint -

trans-unit.source: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a chreideann i an Lá na Recompense

trans-unit.source: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd atá fearful ar an pionós a Thiarna -

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, nach bhfuil an pionós a Thiarna sin as a bhfuil ceann sábháilte -

trans-unit.source: And those who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a garda ina gcodanna príobháideacha

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin as a mná céile nó iad siúd a lámha ceart acu, ar feadh deimhin, nach bhfuil siad le milleán -

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Ach whoever féachann níos faide ná sin, ansin tá siad an transgressors -

trans-unit.source: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd atá ar a n-iontaobhas agus geallúintí aireach

trans-unit.source: And those who are in their testimonies upright
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd atá ina testimonies ina seasamh

trans-unit.source: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a [cúramach] choimeád ar bun a paidir:

trans-unit.source: They will be in gardens, honored.
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad i ngairdíní, onóir.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, cad é [an t-ábhar] leo siúd a disbelieve, hastening [as] roimh tú, [O Muhammad],

trans-unit.source: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?
trans-unit.target: [Le suí] ar [do] ceart agus [do] fágtha i ngrúpaí ar leith?

trans-unit.source: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil gach duine ina measc ag dréim le dul isteach i gairdín pléisiúir?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, I swear ag an Tiarna ar [fad] risings agus suímh sin go deimhin Tá muid in ann

trans-unit.source: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.
trans-unit.target: Chur in ionad iad le níos fearr ná iad;

trans-unit.source: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, iad a fhágáil comhrá vainly agus amuse féin go dtí go gcomhlíonann siad a n-lá a bhfuil siad geallta -

trans-unit.source: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.
trans-unit.target: An Lá beidh siad chun cinn as na huaigheanna tapa amhail is dá mba, i dtreo idol in airde, hastening.

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.
trans-unit.target: A súile humbled, beidh náiriú iad a chlúdach.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, chuir muid Noah ar a chuid daoine, [ag rá], "Tabhair rabhadh do dhaoine sula dtagann ann dóibh pionós painful."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "O mo mhuintir, go deimhin, tá mé duit warner soiléir,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.
trans-unit.target: [Ag rá], 'adhradh Allah, eagla Eisean agus obey dom.

trans-unit.source: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "
trans-unit.target: Beidh Allah logh duit do peacaí agus tú mall ar feadh téarma shonraithe.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.
trans-unit.target: Dúirt sé, "Mo Thiarna, go deimhin cuireadh mé mo dhaoine [chun fírinne] oíche agus lá.

trans-unit.source: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.
trans-unit.target: Ach mhéadaigh mo chuireadh dóibh nach amháin ar eitilt.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, gach uair iarr mé leo go Is féidir leat a logh iad, chuir siad a n-mhéara ina chluasa, clúdaithe iad féin a n-éadaí, fós, agus bhí sotalach le [mór] arrogance.

trans-unit.source: Then I invited them publicly.
trans-unit.target: Ansin iarr mé orthu go poiblí.

trans-unit.source: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly
trans-unit.target: Ansin d'fhógair mé dóibh agus [freisin] confided dóibh rúnda

trans-unit.source: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: Agus dúirt: "Iarr ar maithiúnas do Tiarna.

trans-unit.source: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé a sheoladh [báisteach ó] spéir ar tú i cithfholcadáin [leanúint]

trans-unit.source: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.
trans-unit.target: Agus a thabhairt duit méadú saibhreas agus leanaí agus a chur ar fáil duit gairdíní agus ar do shon aibhneacha.

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur
trans-unit.target: Cad é [an t-ábhar] a bhfuil tú nach mian leat a lua le Allah [dlite] grandeur

trans-unit.source: While He has created you in stages?
trans-unit.target: Cé go bhfuil sé ag chruthaigh tú i gcéimeanna?

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers
trans-unit.target: bhfuil tú ag smaoineamh conas tá Allah chruthaigh seacht flaithis i sraitheanna

trans-unit.source: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne an ghealach ann a [feiceáil] solas agus rinne na gréine lampa dhó?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá Allah ba chúis leat chun fás ó na talún a [forásach] fás.

trans-unit.source: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh sé ar ais tú isteach é agus sliocht tú eastóscadh [eile].

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse
trans-unit.target: Agus tá Allah déanta duit an domhain Fairsinge

trans-unit.source: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "
trans-unit.target: Gur féidir leat a leanúint bóithre ann de pasáiste. '

trans-unit.source: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.
trans-unit.target: Noah dúirt sé, "Mo Thiarna, go deimhin, tá siad disobeyed dom agus lean é a saibhreas agus ní bheidh na páistí a mhéadú air ach amháin i caillteanais.

trans-unit.source: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.
trans-unit.target: Agus conspired siad comhcheilg ollmhór.

trans-unit.source: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.
trans-unit.target: Agus dúirt: "Ná fág do déithe agus riamh a fhágáil Wadd nó Suwa 'nó Yaghuth agus Ya'uq agus Nasr.

trans-unit.source: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."
trans-unit.target: Agus cheana féin, tá siad amú leor.

trans-unit.source: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.
trans-unit.target: De bharr a bpeacaí go raibh siad báite agus a chur isteach sa Dóiteáin, agus ní fuair siad dóibh féin seachas Allah [aon] Cúntóirí.

trans-unit.source: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
trans-unit.target: Agus dúirt Noah, "Mo Thiarna, ná fág ar an domhan as líon na disbelievers an áitritheora.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, má fhágann tú iad, beidh siad amú do sheirbhísigh agus ní beget amháin [gach] ceann wicked agus [deimhnithe] disbeliever.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
trans-unit.target: Mo Thiarna, maith dom agus mo thuismitheoirí agus whoever thiocfaidh mo teach a believer agus na fir a chreidiúint agus mná a chreidiúint.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Abair, [O Muhammad], "Tá sé le fios dom gur éist grúpa den jinn agus dúirt:" Go deimhin, ní mór dúinn éisteacht le Qur'an iontach.

trans-unit.source: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: Treoraíonn sí an cúrsa ceart, agus táimid tar éis chreid ann.

trans-unit.source: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
trans-unit.target: Agus [múineann sé] go exalted is nobleness ár dTiarna;

trans-unit.source: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: Agus go bhfuil ár cheann foolish ag rá faoi Allah ar transgression iomarcach.

trans-unit.source: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí shíl muid riamh go mbeadh cine daonna agus an jinn labhairt faoi Allah bréag.

trans-unit.source: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.
trans-unit.target: Agus bhí fear ó mankind a lorg tearmainn i fir ón jinn, mar sin siad [amháin] Mhéadaigh siad ualach.

trans-unit.source: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].
trans-unit.target: Agus shíl siad, mar a shíl tú, riamh go mbeadh Allah sheoladh duine ar bith [mar theachtaire].

trans-unit.source: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní mór dúinn d'fhéach [a bhaint] an spéir ach fuarthas líonadh sé le gardaí chumhachtach agus lasracha dhó.

trans-unit.source: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.
trans-unit.target: Agus úsáid againn suí sa Teach sin i bpoist le héisteacht, ach beidh whoever éisteann anois teacht lasair a dhó atá suite i fanacht dó.

trans-unit.source: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
trans-unit.target: Agus níl a fhios againn [mar sin] an bhfuil sé i gceist olc do dhaoine ar an talamh nó an mbeartaíonn a Thiarna dóibh cúrsa ceart.

trans-unit.source: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.
trans-unit.target: Agus i measc dúinn go bhfuil an righteous, agus inár measc iad [eile] ní amhlaidh;

trans-unit.source: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní mór dúinn a bheith cinnte go ní bheidh muid faoi deara teip Allah ar domhan, ná ní féidir linn éalú Eisean ag eitilt.

trans-unit.source: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a chuala muid an treoir, chreid muid ann.

trans-unit.source: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.
trans-unit.target: Agus inár measc iad Muslims [in bhráid Allah], agus i measc dúinn go bhfuil an éagórach.

trans-unit.source: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'
trans-unit.target: Ach mar do na éagórach, beidh siad, ar feadh ifreann, connadh. "

trans-unit.source: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
trans-unit.target: Agus [Allah Léirigh] dá mbeadh d'fhan siad díreach ar an mbealach seo, Ba mhaith linn a thabhairt dóibh ar sholáthar flúirseach

trans-unit.source: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, d'fhéadfadh muid iad a thástáil ann.

trans-unit.source: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
trans-unit.target: Agus [Léirigh sé] go bhfuil na masjids do Allah, mar sin ní gá agairt le Allah duine ar bith.

trans-unit.source: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."
trans-unit.target: Agus sin nuair a sheas an Seirbhíseach de Allah suas supplicating Eisean, bhí siad beagnach mar gheall air mais compacted. "

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
trans-unit.target: Abair, [O Muhammad], "mé agairt ach mo Thiarna agus nach chomhlachú leis Eisean duine ar bith."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
trans-unit.target: Abair, "Go deimhin, ní féidir liom go mbeadh ar do shon [an chumhacht de] díobháil nó treo ceart."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: Abair, "Go deimhin, ní bheidh ann a chosaint dom ó Allah dhuine ar bith [má ba chóir dom disobey], ná ní bheidh mé in ann teacht ar eile seachas dó ina dhídean.

trans-unit.source: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
trans-unit.target: Ach [tá mé chun tú] ach fógra ó Allah, agus a teachtaireachtaí "Agus whoever cóir Allah agus a Messenger - ansin go deimhin, mar tá sé an tine de ifreann. Beidh siad cloí ann go deo.

trans-unit.source: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
trans-unit.target: [Leanann na disbelievers] go dtí, nuair a fheiceann siad go bhfuil siad geallta, ansin beidh a fhios acu a bhfuil laige i Cúntóirí agus níos lú a líon.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
trans-unit.target: Abair, "Níl a fhios agam má tá an méid a bhfuil tú ag geallta is in aice le nó an mbeidh mo Thiarna a dheonú chun é a [fada] tréimhse."

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
trans-unit.target: [Tá sé] Knower an unseen, agus ní dhéanann sé a chuid [eolas ar an] unseen do dhuine ar bith a nochtadh

trans-unit.source: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin a mbeidh sé ceadaithe teachtairí, agus go deimhin, cuireann sé faoi bhráid gach teachtaire agus taobh thiar dó breathnóirí

trans-unit.source: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
trans-unit.target: Go bhféadfadh sé a fhios go bhfuil siad in iúl na teachtaireachtaí a Thiarna;

trans-unit.source: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],
trans-unit.target: O tú a wraps féin [i éadaí],

trans-unit.source: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -
trans-unit.target: Thagann chun cinn [guí] an oíche, ach ar feadh beagán -

trans-unit.source: Half of it - or subtract from it a little
trans-unit.target: Leath de é - nó a dhealú ó sé beagán

trans-unit.source: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.
trans-unit.target: Nó a chur air, agus aithris an Qur'an le aithriseoireacht thomhas.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh muid caitheadh ar tú focal trom.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is iad na huaireanta ar an oíche níos éifeachtaí chun comhthoiliú [de chroí agus teanga] agus níos oiriúnaí do focail.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, ar do shon i rith an lae atá fada slí bheatha.

trans-unit.source: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.
trans-unit.target: Agus ná déan dearmad an t-ainm de do Tiarna agus chaitheamh féin a dó le [iomlán] devotion.

trans-unit.source: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.
trans-unit.target: [Tá sé] an Tiarna an Oirthir agus an Iarthair;

trans-unit.source: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.
trans-unit.target: Agus a n-othar os cionn an méid a deir siad agus iad a sheachaint le sheachaint gracious.

trans-unit.source: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.
trans-unit.target: Agus fág Mise le [an t-ábhar] na deniers, iad siúd de mhaolú [i saol], agus cead a thabhairt dóibh faoisimh beagán.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, le Linn [dóibh] Tá geimhle agus tine ar lasadh

trans-unit.source: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -
trans-unit.target: Agus bia a chokes agus pionós painful -

trans-unit.source: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.
trans-unit.target: Ar an Lá an domhain agus na sléibhte a convulse agus beidh na sléibhte a bheith ina gcarn de ghaineamh ag stealladh síos.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá muid a sheoladh duit Messenger mar fhinné ar tú díreach mar Chuireamar le Pharaoh teachtaire.

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.
trans-unit.target: Ach disobeyed Pharaoh an teachtaire, agus mar sin ghabh muid dó le taom fhothrach.

trans-unit.source: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?
trans-unit.target: Ansin, conas is féidir leat a eagla, má disbelieve tú, Lá dhéanfaidh na páistí WHITE- haired?

trans-unit.source: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: Beidh an spéir bhriseadh óna chéile astu;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé seo i gcuimhne, mar sin d'fhéadfadh whoever uachtanna ghlacadh a Thiarna ar bhealach.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, d'Tiarna a fhios, [O Muhammad], go seasann tú [i paidir] beagnach dhá thrian den oíche nó leath de nó an tríú cuid de é, agus [é sin] grúpa de siúd a bhfuil tú.

trans-unit.source: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
trans-unit.target: O tú a chlúdaíonn féin [le ball éadaigh],

trans-unit.source: Arise and warn
trans-unit.target: Éirigh agus rabhadh

trans-unit.source: And your Lord glorify
trans-unit.target: Agus do Thiarna Móraim

trans-unit.source: And your clothing purify
trans-unit.target: Agus do chuid éadaigh purify

trans-unit.source: And uncleanliness avoid
trans-unit.target: Agus sheachaint uncleanliness

trans-unit.source: And do not confer favor to acquire more
trans-unit.target: Agus ná thugann bhfabhar a fháil níos mó

trans-unit.source: But for your Lord be patient.
trans-unit.target: Ach do do Tiarna a n-othar.

trans-unit.source: And when the trumpet is blown,
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn an trumpa blown,

trans-unit.source: That Day will be a difficult day
trans-unit.target: Beidh an lá a bheith ina lá deacair

trans-unit.source: For the disbelievers - not easy.
trans-unit.target: Maidir leis disbelievers - ní éasca.

trans-unit.source: Leave Me with the one I created alone
trans-unit.target: Fág Mise leis an ceann chruthaigh mé féin

trans-unit.source: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
trans-unit.target: Agus dár dheonaigh mé saibhreas fairsing

trans-unit.source: And children present [with him]
trans-unit.target: Agus i láthair páistí [leis]

trans-unit.source: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
trans-unit.target: Agus scaipeadh [rud] os a chomhair, easing [a shaol].

trans-unit.source: Then he desires that I should add more.
trans-unit.target: Ansin mian leis gur chóir dom a chur níos mó.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: I will cover him with arduous torment.
trans-unit.target: beidh mé ag clúdach dó crá arduous.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, cheap sé agus breithniú.

trans-unit.source: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, d'fhéadfadh sé a bheith scriosta [do] conas breithniú aige.

trans-unit.source: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
trans-unit.target: Ansin is féidir é a scrios [do] conas breithniú aige.

trans-unit.source: Then he considered [again];
trans-unit.target: Ansin mheas sé [arís];

trans-unit.source: Then he frowned and scowled;
trans-unit.target: Ansin frowned sé féin agus scowled;

trans-unit.source: Then he turned back and was arrogant
trans-unit.target: Ansin chas sé ar ais agus bhí sotalach

trans-unit.source: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
trans-unit.target: Agus dúirt, "Ní hé seo ach draíocht aithris [ó dhaoine eile].

trans-unit.source: This is not but the word of a human being."
trans-unit.target: Ní ach an focal bheith ag an duine Tá sé seo. "

trans-unit.source: I will drive him into Saqar.
trans-unit.target: Beidh mé ag tiomáint air Saqar isteach.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is Saqar?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad is Saqar?

trans-unit.source: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],
trans-unit.target: Ligeann sé rud ar bith fós agus duilleoga aon rud [unburned],

trans-unit.source: Blackening the skins.
trans-unit.target: Blackening na craicne.

trans-unit.source: Over it are nineteen [angels].
trans-unit.target: Thar bhfuil sé naoi gcinn déag [aingeal].

trans-unit.source: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil déanta againn an coimeádaithe an Dóiteáin amháin aingeal.

trans-unit.source: No! By the moon
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it departs
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an oíche nuair a imíonn sé

trans-unit.source: And [by] the morning when it brightens,
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] maidin nuair brightens sé,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is é an Dóiteáin de na is mó [anacair]

trans-unit.source: As a warning to humanity -
trans-unit.target: Mar rabhadh do daonnachta -

trans-unit.source: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
trans-unit.target: Chun whoever uachtanna measc duit dul ar aghaidh nó a fanacht taobh thiar.

trans-unit.source: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
trans-unit.target: Gach anam, ar a bhfuil sé tuillte a bheidh, a choimeád

trans-unit.source: Except the companions of the right,
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin an compánach an gceart,

trans-unit.source: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
trans-unit.target: [Cé a bheidh] i ngairdíní, ag ceistiú a chéile

trans-unit.source: About the criminals,
trans-unit.target: Maidir leis na coirpigh,

trans-unit.source: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
trans-unit.target: [Agus ag iarraidh orthu], "Cad a chuir tú Saqar isteach?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad ag rá, "Ní Bhí muid ar na daoine a ghuigh,

trans-unit.source: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: Ná raibh úsáid againn chun beatha na mbocht.

trans-unit.source: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
trans-unit.target: Agus úsáid againn chun dul i dioscúrsa vain leo siúd a ghlac páirt [ann],

trans-unit.source: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
trans-unit.target: Agus úsáid againn a dhiúltú ar an Lá na Recompense

trans-unit.source: Until there came to us the certainty."
trans-unit.target: Go dtí go tháinig chugainn an chinnteacht. "

trans-unit.source: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, ní bheidh ann chun tairbhe dóibh an idirghuí [aon] intercessors.

trans-unit.source: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
trans-unit.target: Ansin, cad é [an t-ábhar] leo go bhfuil siad, as an gcuimhne, ag casadh ar shiúl

trans-unit.source: As if they were alarmed donkeys
trans-unit.target: Mar asail dá alarmed siad

trans-unit.source: Fleeing from a lion?
trans-unit.target: Teitheadh ó leon?

trans-unit.source: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
trans-unit.target: Ina ionad sin, mian gach duine ina measc go mbeadh sé a thabhairt scrioptúir scaipeadh faoi.

trans-unit.source: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Then whoever wills will remember it.
trans-unit.target: Ansin whoever uachtanna a cuimhneamh air.

trans-unit.source: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní bheidh siad cuimhneamh ach amháin go uachtanna Allah.

trans-unit.source: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
trans-unit.target: I swear ag an Lá na Aiséirí

trans-unit.source: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].
trans-unit.target: Agus swear ag an anam reproaching [do chinnteacht an aiséirí].

trans-unit.source: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?
trans-unit.target: An cheapann fear nach mbeidh muid le chéile a chnámha?

trans-unit.source: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.
trans-unit.target: Is ea.

trans-unit.source: But man desires to continue in sin.
trans-unit.target: Ach mian fear a leanúint i pheaca.

trans-unit.source: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
trans-unit.target: Iarrann sé, "Nuair a bhíonn an Lá na Aiséirí?"

trans-unit.source: So when vision is dazzled
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, nuair a bhíonn an fhís dazzled

trans-unit.source: And the moon darkens
trans-unit.target: Agus darkens an ghealach

trans-unit.source: And the sun and the moon are joined,
trans-unit.target: Agus an ghrian agus an ghealach acu ceangailte,

trans-unit.source: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"
trans-unit.target: Beidh fear a rá ar an lá, "Cá bhfuil an [áit] éalú?"

trans-unit.source: No! There is no refuge.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.
trans-unit.target: Chun do Thiarna, is Lá, an [áit] buaine.

trans-unit.source: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Beidh Fear an eolas go Lá an méid chuir sé romhainn agus a choinneáil ar ais.

trans-unit.source: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,
trans-unit.target: Ina ionad sin, fear, ina choinne féin, a bheith ina fhinné,

trans-unit.source: Even if he presents his excuses.
trans-unit.target: Fiú má thugann sé a leithscéal.

trans-unit.source: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Bog ní do theanga leis, [O Muhammad], chun hasten le aithriseoireacht an Qur'an.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, ar é Us a bailiúchán [i do chroí] agus [chun go bhféadfar] a aithriseoireacht.

trans-unit.source: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, nuair a bhíonn againn aithris air [trí Gabriel], a leanúint ansin a aithriseoireacht.

trans-unit.source: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
trans-unit.target: Ansin, ar Us é a soiléiriú [chugat].

trans-unit.source: No! But you love the immediate
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And leave the Hereafter.
trans-unit.target: Agus fág an dhiaidh.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,
trans-unit.target: [Roinnt] aghaidheanna, go lá, a bheith radiant,

trans-unit.source: Looking at their Lord.
trans-unit.target: Ag Breathnú ar a Thiarna.

trans-unit.source: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,
trans-unit.target: Agus [roinnt] aghaidheanna, go Lá, a bheidh contorted,

trans-unit.source: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.
trans-unit.target: Ag súil go mbeidh a dhéanamh chun iad [rud] backbreaking.

trans-unit.source: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé sin, "Cé a leigheas [dó]?"

trans-unit.source: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation
trans-unit.target: Agus is é an ceann ag fáil bháis cinnte go bhfuil sé an t [am na] scaradh

trans-unit.source: And the leg is wound about the leg,
trans-unit.target: Agus is é an chos fhoirceannadh mar gheall ar an cos,

trans-unit.source: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.
trans-unit.target: Chun do Thiarna, go lá a bheidh, an procession.

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní raibh an disbeliever chreid, ná go raibh ag guí.

trans-unit.source: But [instead], he denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Ach [ina ionad], shéan sé agus iompaithe ar shiúl.

trans-unit.source: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].
trans-unit.target: Agus ansin chuaigh sé ar a chuid daoine, Swaggering [in bród].

trans-unit.source: Woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: Mairg a thabhairt duit, agus ochón!

trans-unit.source: Then woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: Ansin mairg duit, agus ochón!

trans-unit.source: Does man think that he will be left neglected?
trans-unit.target: An cheapann fear go mbeidh sé ag chlé faillí?

trans-unit.source: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
trans-unit.target: Ní raibh sé ina speirm ó seamhan astaítear?

trans-unit.source: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
trans-unit.target: Ansin, bhí sé ina clot clinging, agus [Allah] cruthaíodh [a fhoirm] agus chomhréireach [dó]

trans-unit.source: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne air dhá mates, an fireann agus baineann.

trans-unit.source: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?
trans-unit.target: Nach bhfuil go [Creator] In ann saol a thabhairt do na mairbh?

trans-unit.source: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
trans-unit.target: Tá ann [gan] teacht ar an fear ar feadh tréimhse ama nuair nach raibh sé an rud [fiú] atá luaite?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, Cruthaithe againn fear ó mheascán sperm-titim go mb'fhéidir iarracht air;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, treoraithe muid air an mbealach seo, a sé buíoch nó a bheith aige ungrateful.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá muid ullmhaithe do na slabhraí agus geimhle disbelievers agus blaze.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh an righteous deoch ó cupán [fíona] arb meascán is de Kafur,

trans-unit.source: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
trans-unit.target: A earrach a mbeidh an [righteous] seirbhísigh de Allah deoch;

trans-unit.source: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
trans-unit.target: Siad [iad siúd a] a chomhlíonadh [n] vows agus eagla Lá bhfuil olc a bheith forleathan.

trans-unit.source: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
trans-unit.target: Agus tugann siad bia in ainneoin an ghrá chun é don ngéarghátar, don dílleacht agus don chuing,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
trans-unit.target: [Ag rá], "Táimid beatha ach amháin le haghaidh an countenance Allah. Is mian linn nach uait luaíocht nó buíochas.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, eagla againn ónár dTiarna Lá austere agus distressful. "

trans-unit.source: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, beidh Allah iad a chosaint ó olc an Lae agus a thabhairt dóibh radiance agus sonas

trans-unit.source: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh dtabharfar cúiteamh dóibh as an méid a endured siad foighneach [le] gairdín [i Paradise] agus síoda [baill éadaigh].

trans-unit.source: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
trans-unit.target: [Beidh siad] reclining ann ar couches adorned.

trans-unit.source: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
trans-unit.target: Agus in aice thar acu a shades, agus a chuid [torthaí] a roghnaíodh a bheith ísliú i gcomhlíonadh.

trans-unit.source: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh a scaipeadh i measc iad soithí airgid agus cupáin a bheith [cruthaíodh] soiléir [mar ghloine],

trans-unit.source: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.
trans-unit.target: gloiní Clear [déanta] as airgead a bhfuil siad a chinneadh an beart.

trans-unit.source: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh siad a thabhairt a ól cupán [fíona] arb meascán is de ginger

trans-unit.source: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
trans-unit.target: [Ó] scairdeán laistigh Paradise ainmnithe Salsabeel.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
trans-unit.target: Beidh scaipeadh ann i measc iad buachaillí óga a rinneadh síoraí.

trans-unit.source: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a fhéachann tú ann [i Paradise], feicfidh tú pléisiúir agus tiarnas mhór.

trans-unit.source: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
trans-unit.target: Ar na háitritheoirí a bheith éadaí glasa síoda fíneáil agus brocade.

trans-unit.source: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
trans-unit.target: [Agus beidh sé a rá], "Go deimhin, tá sé seo ar do shon ar luaíocht, agus tá do iarracht mhór."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé againn a sheoladh síos a thabhairt duit, [O Muhammad], an Qur'an go comhleanúnach.

trans-unit.source: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, a n-othar leis an gcinneadh ar do Tiarna agus nach obey as measc iad peacach nó ungrateful [disbeliever].

trans-unit.source: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
trans-unit.target: Agus trácht ar an t-ainm do Tiarna [i paidir] maidin agus tráthnóna

trans-unit.source: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
trans-unit.target: Agus le linn an prostrate hoíche dó agus exalt Eisean a [cuid den] fada oíche.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, na [disbelievers] grá an láithreach agus a fhágáil taobh thiar dóibh Lá uaigh.

trans-unit.source: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
trans-unit.target: Táimid tar éis a chruthaigh iad agus a neartú lena bhfoirmeacha, agus nuair a bheidh muid, is féidir linn a athrú a gcuid likenesses le [iomlán] athrú.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé seo i gcuimhne, mar sin an té a uachtanna a ghlacadh a Thiarna ar bhealach.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní gá duit a bheidh a eisceadh go uachtanna Allah.

trans-unit.source: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Admhaíonn sé lena sé uachtanna isteach a trócaire;

trans-unit.source: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
trans-unit.target: Acu siúd [gaotha] sheoladh amach in séideáin

trans-unit.source: And the winds that blow violently
trans-unit.target: Agus na gaotha a buille violently

trans-unit.source: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] na gaotha a scaipeadh [scamaill]

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who bring criterion
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd [aingil] a thabhairt critéar

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who deliver a message
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd [aingil] a sholáthraíonn teachtaireacht

trans-unit.source: As justification or warning,
trans-unit.target: Mar chosaint nó rabhaidh,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, cad a bhfuil tú ag gealladh é a tharlóidh.

trans-unit.source: So when the stars are obliterated
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, nuair na réalta ag scriosta

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is opened
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn an spéir oscailte

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are blown away
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair na sléibhte a blown away

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers' time has come...
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bheidh an teachtairí 'am tagtha ...

trans-unit.source: For what Day was it postponed?
trans-unit.target: Chun an méid a bhí Lá athló é?

trans-unit.source: For the Day of Judgement.
trans-unit.target: I gcás an Lá na Breithiúnas.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an Lá na Breithiúnas?

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
trans-unit.target: Ní raibh muid scrios an iar pobail?

trans-unit.source: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh muid iad a leanúint leis na cinn níos déanaí.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin chuirimid déileáil leis na coirpigh.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
trans-unit.target: Ní raibh muid a chruthú duit ó leacht disdained?

trans-unit.source: And We placed it in a firm lodging
trans-unit.target: Agus chuir muid é a chur sa thaisceadh daingean

trans-unit.source: For a known extent.
trans-unit.target: Ar feadh a bheag nó a dtugtar.

trans-unit.source: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
trans-unit.target: Agus a chinneadh muid [é], agus den scoth [Táimid] a chinneadh.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a container
trans-unit.target: Bíodh nach Rinneamar an domhain coimeádán

trans-unit.source: Of the living and the dead?
trans-unit.target: As an bheo agus ar mhairbh?

trans-unit.source: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
trans-unit.target: Agus chuir muid ann ard, sléibhte leagtha go daingean agus a thug tú a ól uisce milis.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
trans-unit.target: [Beidh siad in iúl], "Lean ar aghaidh leis an gceann a d'úsáid tú a dhiúltú.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
trans-unit.target: Ar aghaidh go dtí scáth [deataigh] a bhfuil trí cholún

trans-unit.source: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."
trans-unit.target: [Ach tar éis] aon scáth fionnuar agus ag baint leasa as i gcoinne an lasair. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, throws sé Sparks [chomh ollmhór] mar fortress,

trans-unit.source: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.
trans-unit.target: Amhail is dá mba yellowish [dubh] camels.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: This is a Day they will not speak,
trans-unit.target: Is é seo an Lá ní bheidh siad ag labhairt,

trans-unit.source: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.
trans-unit.target: Ná ní bheidh ceadófar dóibh a dhéanamh leithscéal.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Is é seo an Lá na Breithiúnas;

trans-unit.source: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, má tá tú plean, plean ansin aghaidh Me.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh an righteous i measc shades agus spriongaí

trans-unit.source: And fruits from whatever they desire,
trans-unit.target: Agus torthaí ó cibé mian leo,

trans-unit.source: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [A bheith in iúl], "Eat agus deoch i sásamh ar cad a d'úsáid tú a dhéanamh."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, againn dá bhrí sin luach saothair na doers an maith.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [O disbelievers], ithe agus taitneamh a bhaint as díbh féin beagán;

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bheidh sé dúirt sé leo: "Bow [i paidir]," nach bhfuil siad Bow.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers.

trans-unit.source: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh cén ráiteas i ndiaidh an Qur'an a chreideann siad?

trans-unit.source: About what are they asking one another?
trans-unit.target: Faoi na rudaí a bhfuil siad ag iarraidh a chéile?

trans-unit.source: About the great news -
trans-unit.target: Maidir leis an nuacht iontach -

trans-unit.source: That over which they are in disagreement.
trans-unit.target: Go lena linn atá siad i easaontú.

trans-unit.source: No! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Then, no! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, aon!

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
trans-unit.target: Bíodh nach Rinneamar an domhain áit scíthe?

trans-unit.source: And the mountains as stakes?
trans-unit.target: Agus na sléibhte mar Geallta?

trans-unit.source: And We created you in pairs
trans-unit.target: Agus chruthaigh againn go mbainfidh tú i mbeirteanna

trans-unit.source: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne do chodladh [bhealach chun] eile

trans-unit.source: And made the night as clothing
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne an oíche mar éadaí

trans-unit.source: And made the day for livelihood
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne an lae do shlí bheatha

trans-unit.source: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
trans-unit.target: Agus déanta thuas tú seacht [flaithis] láidir

trans-unit.source: And made [therein] a burning lamp
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne [ann] lampa dhó

trans-unit.source: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
trans-unit.target: Agus chuir síos, ó na scamaill rain, ag stealladh uisce

trans-unit.source: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
trans-unit.target: Gur féidir linn a thabhairt amach rud gráin agus fásra

trans-unit.source: And gardens of entwined growth.
trans-unit.target: Agus gairdíní fáis fite.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is é an Lá na Breithiúnas an ama a bheidh ceaptha -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
trans-unit.target: Is é an Lá Corn séidte agus beidh tú ag teacht amach i multitudes

trans-unit.source: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
trans-unit.target: Agus is é an spéir oscailte agus beidh sé geataí

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá na sléibhte bhaint agus beidh sé [ach] Mirage.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá ifreann curtha atá suite i fanacht

trans-unit.source: For the transgressors, a place of return,
trans-unit.target: Maidir leis transgressors, áit toraidh,

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
trans-unit.target: Ina mbeidh siad fós d'aois [unending].

trans-unit.source: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
trans-unit.target: Ní bheidh siad blas ann [aon] coolness nó deoch

trans-unit.source: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin uisce agus [bréan] purulence scalding -

trans-unit.source: An appropriate recompense.
trans-unit.target: An cúiteamh cuí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, ní raibh siad ag súil le cuntas

trans-unit.source: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
trans-unit.target: Agus shéan Ár véarsaí le [emphatic] denial.

trans-unit.source: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
trans-unit.target: Ach gach rud Táimid áirithe i scríbhinn.

trans-unit.source: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
trans-unit.target: "Mar sin, blas [an pionós], agus ní Méadóimid tú ach amháin i torment."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, an righteous Is gnóthachtáil -

trans-unit.source: Gardens and grapevines
trans-unit.target: Gairdíní agus grapevines

trans-unit.source: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
trans-unit.target: Agus lán-breasted [compánach] d'aois comhionann

trans-unit.source: And a full cup.
trans-unit.target: Agus cupán iomlán.

trans-unit.source: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
trans-unit.target: Ní bheidh aon chaint tinn siad ag éisteacht inti no ar éinne falsehood -

trans-unit.source: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
trans-unit.target: [Mar] luaíocht ó do Thiarna, [flaithiúil] bronntanas [rinne bheidh dlite] cuntas,

trans-unit.source: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
trans-unit.target: [Ón] an Tiarna na spéartha agus an talamh, agus is cuma cad é eatarthu, an chuid is mó trócaire.

trans-unit.source: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
trans-unit.target: An Lá go mbeidh an Spiorad agus na haingil seasamh i sraitheanna, ní bheidh siad ag labhairt ach amháin i gcás amháin dá bhfuil na ceadanna chuid is mó trócaire, agus beidh sé ag rá cad é ceart.

trans-unit.source: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
trans-unit.target: Is é sin an Lá Fíor;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá muid rabhadh duit ar pionós aice ar an Lá nuair a bheidh fear breathnú ar cad tá a lámha a chur amach agus beidh an disbeliever rá, "Oh, ba mhaith liom go raibh mé deannach!"

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] who extract with violence
trans-unit.target: Acu siúd [aingeal] a bhaint le foréigean

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who remove with ease
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] na daoine a bhaint gan stró

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] na daoine a glide [amhail is dá mba] snámha

trans-unit.source: And those who race each other in a race
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a cine a chéile i rás

trans-unit.source: And those who arrange [each] matter,
trans-unit.target: Agus iad siúd a shocrú [gach] ábhar,

trans-unit.source: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
trans-unit.target: Beidh ar an Lá an soinneáin [an Corn] convulse [chruthú],

trans-unit.source: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
trans-unit.target: Beidh a leanúint ann sé an [amháin] ina dhiaidh sin.

trans-unit.source: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
trans-unit.target: Hearts, go Lá bheidh, tremble,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled.
trans-unit.target: A súile humbled.

trans-unit.source: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
trans-unit.target: Tá siad [láthair] ag rá, "An mbeidh muid a chur ar ais go deimhin, go dtí [ár] staid iar [den saol]?

trans-unit.source: Even if we should be decayed bones?
trans-unit.target: Fiú má ba chóir dúinn a bheith cnámha lofa?

trans-unit.source: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
trans-unit.target: Deir siad, "Sin, ansin bheadh, a bheith ar ais chailliúint."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh sé ach shout amháin,

trans-unit.source: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
trans-unit.target: Agus go tobann beidh siad [airdeall] ar dhromchla an domhain.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
trans-unit.target: Tá shroich tú an scéal Moses?

trans-unit.source: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
trans-unit.target: Nuair a d'iarr a Thiarna dó i ngleann naofa na Tuwa,

trans-unit.source: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: "Téigh go dtí Pharaoh. Go deimhin, tá transgressed sé.

trans-unit.source: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
trans-unit.target: Agus a rá leis: "Ar mhaith leat [bheith sásta] purify féin

trans-unit.source: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
trans-unit.target: Agus lig dom tú a threorú chuig do Thiarna ionas go mbeadh tú eagla [Eisean]? ""

trans-unit.source: And he showed him the greatest sign,
trans-unit.target: Agus léirigh sé é an comhartha is mó,

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
trans-unit.target: Ach Shéan Pharaoh agus disobeyed.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned his back, striving.
trans-unit.target: Ansin chas sé a dhroim, ag iarraidh.

trans-unit.source: And he gathered [his people] and called out
trans-unit.target: Agus a bailíodh sé [chuid daoine] agus ar a dtugtar amach

trans-unit.source: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
trans-unit.target: Agus dúirt sé, "Tá mé do thighearna is exalted."

trans-unit.source: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, urghabhadh Allah dó pionós eiseamláireach haghaidh an ceann deireanach agus an chéad [transgression].

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin sa mhéid is go bhfuil rabhadh do bheadh whoever eagla [Allah].

trans-unit.source: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil tú a chruthú níos deacra nó go bhfuil an spéir?

trans-unit.source: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
trans-unit.target: D'ardaigh sé a uasteorainn agus chomhréireach é.

trans-unit.source: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
trans-unit.target: Agus dhorchaigh sé a oíche agus a eastósctar a gile.

trans-unit.source: And after that He spread the earth.
trans-unit.target: Agus tar éis go leathadh sé an domhain.

trans-unit.source: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
trans-unit.target: bhaintear sé as é a uisce agus a féaraigh,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains He set firmly
trans-unit.target: Agus na sléibhte Bhunaigh sé go daingean

trans-unit.source: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: Mar soláthar duit féin agus do beostoc féaraigh.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Ach nuair a thagann ann an Calamity mó mhillteanach -

trans-unit.source: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
trans-unit.target: An Lá nuair a bheidh an fear cuimhnigh go a strove sé,

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh Hellfire bheith faoi lé do [uile] iad siúd a fheiceáil -

trans-unit.source: So as for he who transgressed
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, mar do té a transgressed

trans-unit.source: And preferred the life of the world,
trans-unit.target: Agus is fearr ar an saol ar an domhain,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Ansin go deimhin, beidh Hellfire a [a] dhídean.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
trans-unit.target: Ach de réir mar le té a eagla seasamh a Thiarna agus cosc an anam ó [neamhdhleathach] inclination,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Ansin go deimhin, beidh Paradise a [a] dhídean.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
trans-unit.target: Iarr siad duit, [O Muhammad], mar gheall ar an Uair: nuair is é a theacht?

trans-unit.source: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
trans-unit.target: Cén [seasamh] Tá tú gur chóir duit a lua é?

trans-unit.source: To your Lord is its finality.
trans-unit.target: Chun do Tiarna a críochnaitheacht.

trans-unit.source: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
trans-unit.target: Tá tú ach Warner dóibh siúd a eagla air.

trans-unit.source: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé, ar an Lá fheiceann siad é, amhail is nach raibh siad fós [ar fud an domhain] amháin ar tráthnóna nó maidin sin.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet frowned and turned away
trans-unit.target: An Prophet frowned agus iompú ar shiúl

trans-unit.source: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
trans-unit.target: Toisc go tháinig chuige an fear dall, [cur isteach].

trans-unit.source: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
trans-unit.target: Ach cad a dhéanann bhraitheann tú, [O Muhammad], go mb'fhéidir é a d'fhéadfaí a íonaithe

trans-unit.source: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
trans-unit.target: Nó a chur i gcuimhne agus go mbeadh an chuimhne tairbhe dó?

trans-unit.source: As for he who thinks himself without need,
trans-unit.target: Maidir té a cheapann é féin gan ghá,

trans-unit.source: To him you give attention.
trans-unit.target: Dó a thabhairt duit aird.

trans-unit.source: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní ar tú [aon locht] más rud é nach mbeidh sé a íonaithe.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
trans-unit.target: Ach de réir mar le té a tháinig chugat ag iarraidh [le haghaidh eolais]

trans-unit.source: While he fears [Allah],
trans-unit.target: Cé eagla sé [Allah],

trans-unit.source: From him you are distracted.
trans-unit.target: Uaidh tá tú distracted.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: So whoever wills may remember it.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, whoever uachtanna fhéadfadh cuimhneamh air.

trans-unit.source: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
trans-unit.target: [Tá sé taifeadta] i mbrait onóir,

trans-unit.source: Exalted and purified,
trans-unit.target: Exalted agus íonaithe,

trans-unit.source: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
trans-unit.target: [Tugtha] trí na lámha ar teachtaire-aingeal,

trans-unit.source: Noble and dutiful.
trans-unit.target: Uasal agus dutiful.

trans-unit.source: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
trans-unit.target: Cursed Tá fear;

trans-unit.source: From what substance did He create him?
trans-unit.target: Ó cad substaint raibh sé a chruthú dó?

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
trans-unit.target: Ó sperm-titim chruthaigh sé air agus ndán dó;

trans-unit.source: Then He eased the way for him;
trans-unit.target: Ansin eased sé an mbealach dó;

trans-unit.source: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
trans-unit.target: Ansin cúiseanna sé a bhás agus soláthraíonn uaigh dó.

trans-unit.source: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, nuair a sé uachtanna, beidh sé resurrect dó.

trans-unit.source: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Then let mankind look at his food -
trans-unit.target: Ansin lig breathnú mankind ar a chuid bia -

trans-unit.source: How We poured down water in torrents,
trans-unit.target: Conas poured muid síos uisce i torrents,

trans-unit.source: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
trans-unit.target: Ansin bhris muid a oscailt an domhain, scoilteadh [sé le sprouts],

trans-unit.source: And caused to grow within it grain
trans-unit.target: Agus ba chúis le fás laistigh gráin sé

trans-unit.source: And grapes and herbage
trans-unit.target: Agus fíonchaora agus luibhre

trans-unit.source: And olive and palm trees
trans-unit.target: Agus olóige agus crainn pailme

trans-unit.source: And gardens of dense shrubbery
trans-unit.target: Agus gairdíní de rosáin dlúth

trans-unit.source: And fruit and grass -
trans-unit.target: Agus torthaí agus féar -

trans-unit.source: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: [Mar] taitneamh duit féin agus do beostoc féaraigh.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
trans-unit.target: Ach nuair a thagann ann an BLAST Deafening

trans-unit.source: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
trans-unit.target: Ar an Lá mbeidh fear teitheadh óna dheartháir

trans-unit.source: And his mother and his father
trans-unit.target: Agus a mháthair agus a athair

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his children,
trans-unit.target: Agus a bhean chéile agus a pháistí,

trans-unit.source: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
trans-unit.target: I gcás gach fear, go bhfuil lá a bheidh, a bheith ina ábhar leordhóthanach dó.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
trans-unit.target: Beidh [Roinnt] aghaidheanna, is lá, a bheith geal -

trans-unit.source: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
trans-unit.target: Laughing, rejoicing ag dea-scéal.

trans-unit.source: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh [eile] aghaidheanna, go Lá, ní mór orthu deannaigh.

trans-unit.source: Blackness will cover them.
trans-unit.target: Beidh blackness iad a chlúdach.

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
trans-unit.target: Sin iad na disbelievers, na cinn wicked.

trans-unit.source: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
trans-unit.target: Nuair a bhíonn an ghrian fillte suas [sa dorchadas]

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a thagann na réaltaí, scairdeadh,

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are removed
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair na sléibhte a bhaint

trans-unit.source: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair lán-téarma sí-camels ndearnadh faillí orthu

trans-unit.source: And when the wild beasts are gathered
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair na beithigh allta a bailíodh

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are filled with flame
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn na farraigí líonadh le lasair

trans-unit.source: And when the souls are paired
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a an anamacha a péireáilte

trans-unit.source: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn an cailín [a bhí] curtha beo iarr

trans-unit.source: For what sin she was killed
trans-unit.target: Ar cad pheaca do marbadh di

trans-unit.source: And when the pages are made public
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair na leathanaigh seo ar fáil don phobal

trans-unit.source: And when the sky is stripped away
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn an spéir stripped shiúl

trans-unit.source: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn Hellfire leagtha ablaze

trans-unit.source: And when Paradise is brought near,
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn Paradise tugtha amach in aice,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
trans-unit.target: Beidh anam [ansin] fhios cad thug sé [leis].

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the retreating stars -
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, I swear ag na réaltaí cúlú -

trans-unit.source: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
trans-unit.target: Iad siúd a reáchtáil [gcuid cúrsaí] agus imíonn siad -

trans-unit.source: And by the night as it closes in
trans-unit.target: Agus ag an oíche mar dúnann sé i

trans-unit.source: And by the dawn when it breathes
trans-unit.target: Agus ag an tús nuair a breathes sé

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
trans-unit.target: [Go] go deimhin, is é an Qur'an focal [iompar ag] theachtaire uasal

trans-unit.source: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
trans-unit.target: [Cé atá] seilbh na cumhachta agus leis an Úinéir an Throne, slán [i riocht],

trans-unit.source: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
trans-unit.target: Deineadh ann [sna flaithis] agus iontaofa.

trans-unit.source: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
trans-unit.target: Agus is é do chompánach nach [chor] mheabhair.

trans-unit.source: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
trans-unit.target: Agus bhfuil feicthe aige cheana Gabriel i na spéire soiléir.

trans-unit.source: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil Muhammad ina withholder de [eolas] an unseen.

trans-unit.source: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil an Qur'an an focal diabhal, a dhíbirt [ó na flaithis].

trans-unit.source: So where are you going?
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, i gcás ina bhfuil tú ag dul?

trans-unit.source: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
trans-unit.target: Níl sé eisceadh gcuimhne do na saol

trans-unit.source: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
trans-unit.target: Do whoever uachtanna bhur measc a ghlacadh ar chúrsa ceart.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní gá duit a bheidh a eisceadh go uachtanna Allah - Tiarna na saol.

trans-unit.source: When the sky breaks apart
trans-unit.target: Nuair a bhriseann an spéir ar leith

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, scattering,
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a thagann na réaltaí, scaipeadh,

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are erupted
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair na farraigí a erupted

trans-unit.source: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a an [ábhar] uaigheanna scaipthe,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Beidh anam [ansin] fhios a bhfuil sé curtha amach agus a choimeád ar ais.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
trans-unit.target: O chine daonna, tá an méid a deceived bhaineann tú do Thiarna, an fial,

trans-unit.source: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
trans-unit.target: Cé a chruthaigh tú, chomhréireach tú, agus cothrom agat?

trans-unit.source: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
trans-unit.target: I cibé foirm willed sé le chéile sé leat.

trans-unit.source: No! But you deny the Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, [ceaptha] thar a bhfuil tú coimeádaithe,

trans-unit.source: Noble and recording;
trans-unit.target: Noble agus taifeadta;

trans-unit.source: They know whatever you do.
trans-unit.target: Tá a fhios acu is cuma cad a dhéanann tú.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh an righteous a bheith i pléisiúir,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, beidh an ghránna a bheith i Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad [cuir isteach chun] dhó ann ar an Lá na Recompense,

trans-unit.source: And never therefrom will they be absent.
trans-unit.target: Agus astu ní bheidh siad as láthair.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an Lá na Recompense?

trans-unit.source: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Ansin, cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an Lá na Recompense?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Is é an lá nuair nach mbeidh Soul sealbhú chun anam eile [chumhacht a dhéanamh] rud;

trans-unit.source: Woe to those who give less [than due],
trans-unit.target: Mairg dóibh siúd a thabhairt níos lú [ná dlite],

trans-unit.source: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
trans-unit.target: Cé, nuair a ghlacann siad beart ó dhaoine, a chur ina n-iomláine.

trans-unit.source: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Ach má thugann siad le beart nó de réir meáchain dóibh, a chur faoi deara siad caillteanas.

trans-unit.source: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil siad ní dóigh go mbeidh siad resurrected

trans-unit.source: For a tremendous Day -
trans-unit.target: Ar Lá ollmhór -

trans-unit.source: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
trans-unit.target: An Lá nuair a bheidh an cine daonna seasamh os comhair an Tiarna de na saol?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad is sijjeen?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Is [a gceann scríbe a taifeadadh i] a Inscríofa chlár.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Mairg, is lá, leis na deniers,

trans-unit.source: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Cé dhiúltú ar an Lá na Recompense.

trans-unit.source: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
trans-unit.target: Agus aon cheann dhiúltú dó ach amháin gach transgressor Nós Nua.

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Nuair a againn véarsaí aithris dó, a deir sé, "Legends an iar- bpobal."

trans-unit.source: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ansin go deimhin, beidh siad [isteach agus] sruthán i Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh sé a rá [leo], "Is é seo a d'úsáid tú a dhiúltú."

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é 'illiyyun?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
trans-unit.target: Tá sé [a gceann scríbe thaifeadadh i] gclár inscríofa

trans-unit.source: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Cé acu is fianaithe ag na tugtha amach in aice [chun Allah].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh an righteous a bheith i pléisiúir

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Ar couches adorned, ag breathnú.

trans-unit.source: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Beidh tú a aithint i n-aghaidh ar an radiance pléisiúir.

trans-unit.source: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad a thabhairt do deoch [íon] fíon [a bhí] séalaithe.

trans-unit.source: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
trans-unit.target: Is é an ceann deireanach de sé musk.

trans-unit.source: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
trans-unit.target: Agus is é a meascán de Tasneem,

trans-unit.source: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
trans-unit.target: A earrach óna siúd gar [chun Allah] ól.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, iad siúd a tiomanta coireanna úsáidtear chun gáire ar dhaoine a chreid.

trans-unit.source: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a ritheadh siad acu, bheadh siad a mhalartú amharc derisive.

trans-unit.source: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a d'fhill siad ar a n-daoine, bheadh siad ar ais jesting.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a chonaic siad iad, bheadh siad ag rá, "Go deimhin, iad siúd atá fíor caillte."

trans-unit.source: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
trans-unit.target: Ach ní raibh siad curtha chuig mar chaomhnóirí os a gcionn.

trans-unit.source: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, lá atá inniu iad siúd a chreid ag gáire ag na disbelievers,

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Ar couches adorned, ag breathnú.

trans-unit.source: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil na disbelievers [nár] bronntar [Lá seo] ar cad a úsáidtear iad a dhéanamh?

trans-unit.source: When the sky has split [open]
trans-unit.target: Nuair a bheidh an spéir scoilt [oscailte]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
trans-unit.target: Agus fhreagair a Thiarna agus cuireadh oibleagáid [é sin a dhéanamh]

trans-unit.source: And when the earth has been extended
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bheidh an talamh sínte

trans-unit.source: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
trans-unit.target: Agus tá caitheadh amach go laistigh é agus relinquished [é]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
trans-unit.target: Agus fhreagair a Thiarna agus cuireadh oibleagáid [é sin a dhéanamh] -

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
trans-unit.target: O chine daonna, go deimhin, tá tú ag saothrú i dtreo do Tiarna le [mór] exertion agus buailfidh siad le chéile é.

trans-unit.source: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
trans-unit.target: Ansin is do té tugtha chuid taifead ina láimh dheis,

trans-unit.source: He will be judged with an easy account
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé a mheas le cuntas éasca

trans-unit.source: And return to his people in happiness.
trans-unit.target: Agus filleadh ar a chuid daoine i sonas.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
trans-unit.target: Ach de réir mar le té tugtha a thaifead taobh thiar a dhroim,

trans-unit.source: He will cry out for destruction
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé caoin amach lena ndíothú

trans-unit.source: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Agus [cuir isteach chun] dhó i Blaze.
