trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, bhí sé [uair amháin] curtha i measc a mhuintir i sonas;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, bhí shíl sé riamh go mbeadh sé ar ais [do Allah].

trans-unit.source: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ach tá!

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the twilight glow
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, I swear ag an Glow Twilight

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night and what it envelops
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an oíche agus cén envelops sé

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an ghealach nuair a bhíonn sé lán

trans-unit.source: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
trans-unit.target: [Go] beidh tú taithí surely stáit i ndiaidh stáit.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, cad é [an t-ábhar] leo [go] nach gcreideann siad,

trans-unit.source: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: Agus nuair a bhíonn an Qur'an aithristear dóibh, nach bhfuil siad prostrate [a Allah]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have disbelieved deny,
trans-unit.target: Ach iad siúd a disbelieved dhiúltú,

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
trans-unit.target: Agus is é Allah an chuid is mó a fhios agam an méid a choimeádann siad laistigh féin.

trans-unit.source: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, a thabhairt dóibh tidings de pionós painful,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin i gcás iad siúd a chreideann agus a dhéanann gníomhais righteous.

trans-unit.source: By the sky containing great stars
trans-unit.target: De réir an spéir ina réaltaí móra

trans-unit.source: And [by] the promised Day
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] Lá geallta

trans-unit.source: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] Tá an bhfinné agus cad a chonaic,

trans-unit.source: Cursed were the companions of the trench
trans-unit.target: Cursed Bhí an compánach an trinse

trans-unit.source: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
trans-unit.target: [A bhfuil] an tine iomlán de bhreosla,

trans-unit.source: When they were sitting near it
trans-unit.target: Nuair a bhí siad ina suí in aice

trans-unit.source: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
trans-unit.target: Agus siad, leis an méid a bhí á dhéanamh acu in aghaidh na believers, bhí finnéithe.

trans-unit.source: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
trans-unit.target: Agus resented siad leo gan ach amháin mar gur chreid siad i Allah, an exalted sa fhéadfadh, an moladh,

trans-unit.source: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
trans-unit.target: Ar leis an tiarnas na spéartha agus an talamh.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh iad siúd a bhfuil céasadh na fir a chreidiúint agus mná a chreidiúint, agus ansin nach bhfuil repented bhfuil an pionósú ifreann, agus beidh siad ag an pionós an Dóiteáin Dó.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh iad siúd a bhfuil chreid agus a rinneadh gníomhais righteous bhfuil gairdíní faoi bhun a sreabhadh aibhneacha.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is é an bhfeice de do Tiarna dian.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá sé té a thionscnaíonn [chruthú] agus athuair.

trans-unit.source: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé an forgiving, an affectionate,

trans-unit.source: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
trans-unit.target: Onórach Úinéir an Throne,

trans-unit.source: Effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Effecter an méid sé i gceist aige.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
trans-unit.target: Tá shroich tú an scéal na saighdiúirí -

trans-unit.source: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
trans-unit.target: [Glacfar de] Pharaoh agus Thamud?

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
trans-unit.target: Ach tá siad a disbelieve i [leanúnach] denial,

trans-unit.source: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
trans-unit.target: Cé go gcuimsíonn Allah iad ó taobh thiar.

trans-unit.source: But this is an honored Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Ach tá sé seo an Qur'an onóir

trans-unit.source: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
trans-unit.target: [Inscríofa] i Slate Coinnithe.

trans-unit.source: By the sky and the night comer -
trans-unit.target: De réir an spéir agus an comer oíche -

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an comer oíche?

trans-unit.source: It is the piercing star -
trans-unit.target: Is é an réalta piercing -

trans-unit.source: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
trans-unit.target: Níl aon anam, ach go bhfuil sé níos mó ná é protector.

trans-unit.source: So let man observe from what he was created.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin a ligean fear faoi deara as an méid a bhí chruthaigh sé.

trans-unit.source: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
trans-unit.target: Bhí sé a cruthaíodh ó sreabhach, scaoileadh,

trans-unit.source: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
trans-unit.target: Ag teacht chun cinn as idir an cnámh droma agus an ribs.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, Allah, a thabhairt ar ais dó [an saol] Is, In ann.

trans-unit.source: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
trans-unit.target: An Lá nuair a bheidh rúin a chur ar a thriail,

trans-unit.source: Then man will have no power or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh fear a bhfuil aon chumhacht nó aon cúntóir.

trans-unit.source: By the sky which returns [rain]
trans-unit.target: De réir an spéir a tuairisceáin [rain]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an domhain a cracks oscailte,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is é an Qur'an ráiteas cinntitheach,

trans-unit.source: And it is not amusement.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil sé spraoi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá siad ag pleanáil le plean,

trans-unit.source: But I am planning a plan.
trans-unit.target: Ach tá mé ag pleanáil le plean.

trans-unit.source: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, tabhair am na disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
trans-unit.target: Exalt an t-ainm de do Thiarna, an chuid is mó Ard,

trans-unit.source: Who created and proportioned
trans-unit.target: A chruthaigh agus chomhréireach

trans-unit.source: And who destined and [then] guided
trans-unit.target: Agus a ndán agus [ansin] treoraithe

trans-unit.source: And who brings out the pasture
trans-unit.target: Agus a thugann amach an fhéarach

trans-unit.source: And [then] makes it black stubble.
trans-unit.target: Agus [ansin] a dhéanann sé chonnlaigh dubh.

trans-unit.source: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
trans-unit.target: beidh muid a dhéanamh tú aithris, [O Muhammad], agus ní bheidh tú dearmad,

trans-unit.source: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin cad ba cheart Allah bheidh.

trans-unit.source: And We will ease you toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh muid a mhaolú tú i dtreo gan stró.

trans-unit.source: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
trans-unit.target: Mar sin i gcuimhne, má ba chóir an meabhrúchán tairbhe;

trans-unit.source: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: An té a bhfuil eagla [Allah] a chur i gcuimhne.

trans-unit.source: But the wretched one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Ach beidh an ceann wretched sheachaint -

trans-unit.source: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
trans-unit.target: [Sé] a bheidh ag [cuir isteach agus] sruthán sa Dóiteáin mó,

trans-unit.source: Neither dying therein nor living.
trans-unit.target: Ní ag fáil bháis ann ná ina gcónaí.

trans-unit.source: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
trans-unit.target: Tá sé ag éirigh cinnte a purifies féin

trans-unit.source: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
trans-unit.target: Agus luann an t-ainm a Thiarna agus guí.

trans-unit.source: But you prefer the worldly life,
trans-unit.target: Ach is fearr leat ar an saol worldly,

trans-unit.source: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Cé go bhfuil an dhiaidh níos fearr agus níos buaine.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, is é seo i sean-scriptures,

trans-unit.source: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
trans-unit.target: Na scrioptúir Abraham agus Moses.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
trans-unit.target: Tá shroich tú an tuarascáil an mhillteanach [imeacht]?

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
trans-unit.target: [Roinnt] aghaidheanna, go Lá, beidh humbled,

trans-unit.source: Working [hard] and exhausted.
trans-unit.target: Ag obair [crua] agus ídithe.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad [cuir isteach chun] sruthán i Tine intensely te.

trans-unit.source: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
trans-unit.target: Beidh siad a thabhairt deoch ó earraigh fiuchadh.

trans-unit.source: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
trans-unit.target: Chun iad ní bheidh aon bhia amháin ó nimhiúil, planda deilgneacha

trans-unit.source: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
trans-unit.target: Cé acu ní nourishes ná avails i gcoinne ocrais.

trans-unit.source: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Eile] aghaidheanna, go Lá bheidh, a thaispeáint pléisiúir.

trans-unit.source: With their effort [they are] satisfied
trans-unit.target: Lena n-iarrachtaí [go bhfuil siad] deimhin

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: I gairdín ardaithe,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
trans-unit.target: Wherein gcluinfidh siad aon chaint mí-oiriúnach.

trans-unit.source: Within it is a flowing spring.
trans-unit.target: Laistigh sé an earraigh ag sileadh.

trans-unit.source: Within it are couches raised high
trans-unit.target: Laistigh de sé ag couches a ardaíodh ard

trans-unit.source: And cups put in place
trans-unit.target: Agus cupáin i bhfeidhm

trans-unit.source: And cushions lined up
trans-unit.target: Agus cúisíní lined suas

trans-unit.source: And carpets spread around.
trans-unit.target: Agus cairpéid scaipeadh ar fud.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
trans-unit.target: Ansin nach bhfuil siad ag féachaint ar na camels - conas iad a cruthaíodh?

trans-unit.source: And at the sky - how it is raised?
trans-unit.target: Agus ar an spéir - conas atá sé a ardaíodh?

trans-unit.source: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
trans-unit.target: Agus ag na sléibhte - conas iad in airde?

trans-unit.source: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
trans-unit.target: Agus ag an domhan - conas a dhéantar é scaipthe amach?

trans-unit.source: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin i gcuimhne, [O Muhammad];

trans-unit.source: You are not over them a controller.
trans-unit.target: Nach bhfuil tú os a gcionn rialaitheoir.

trans-unit.source: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
trans-unit.target: Mar sin féin, an té a casadh ar shiúl agus creidfeadh -

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ansin beidh Allah pionós a ghearradh air leis an pionós is mó.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Us is their return.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, go dtí Us tá a n-ais.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
trans-unit.target: Ansin go deimhin, ar Us tá a gcuntas.

trans-unit.source: By the dawn
trans-unit.target: De réir an tús

trans-unit.source: And [by] ten nights
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] deich oíche

trans-unit.source: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an [Uimhir] fiú agus an corr

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it passes,
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an oíche nuair a théann sé,

trans-unit.source: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil [Ní] in [ngach] go mionn [leor] do cheann de aireachtáil?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
trans-unit.target: Bíodh nach tú a mheas conas a dhéileáil do Thiarna le 'AAD -

trans-unit.source: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
trans-unit.target: [Le] IRAM - a raibh piléir ard,

trans-unit.source: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
trans-unit.target: Ní raibh an maith leis na díobh cruthaithe sa talamh?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
trans-unit.target: Agus [le] Thamud, a snoite amach na carraigeacha sa ghleann?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
trans-unit.target: Agus [le] Pharaoh, úinéir an Geallta?

trans-unit.source: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
trans-unit.target: [Gach ceann] acu chois laistigh de na tailte

trans-unit.source: And increased therein the corruption.
trans-unit.target: Agus méadú ann ar an chaimiléireacht.

trans-unit.source: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, poured do Tiarna orthu ina sciúirse de phionóis.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá do Thiarna i breathnadóireachta.

trans-unit.source: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
trans-unit.target: Agus mar do fear, nuair a déanann a Thiarna dó agus [rud] Is flaithiúil dó agus bhfabhar air, a deir sé, "Tá mo Thiarna onóir dom."

trans-unit.source: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
trans-unit.target: Ach nuair a déanann sé féin agus srian a sholáthar, a deir sé, "Tá mo Thiarna uiríslithe dom."

trans-unit.source: No! But you do not honor the orphan
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní gá duit a spreagadh a chéile chun beatha na mbocht.

trans-unit.source: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
trans-unit.target: Agus ithe tú oidhreacht, devouring [sé] fad,

trans-unit.source: And you love wealth with immense love.
trans-unit.target: Agus grá agat saibhreas le grá ollmhór.

trans-unit.source: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
trans-unit.target: Agus tá do Thiarna teacht agus na haingil, céim ar chéim,

trans-unit.source: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
trans-unit.target: Agus thug [laistigh tuairim], is Lá, is é ifreann - go Lá, beidh fear a cuimhneamh, ach cad maith dó a bheith ar an Cuimhneachán?

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé ag rá, "Oh, ba mhaith liom gur sheol mé amach romhainn [roinnt mhaith] do mo shaol."

trans-unit.source: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, ar an lá, beidh aon cheann phionósú [chomh mór] is a phionós,

trans-unit.source: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh aon cheann ceangal [chomh mór] is a ceangailteach [na evildoers].

trans-unit.source: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
trans-unit.target: [Don righteous a bheidh sé a rá], "O suaimhneas anam,

trans-unit.source: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
trans-unit.target: Fill ar ais chuig do Thiarna, dea-sásta agus taitneamhach [dó],

trans-unit.source: And enter among My [righteous] servants
trans-unit.target: Agus cuirfidh sé isteach i measc Mo [righteous] seirbhísigh

trans-unit.source: And enter My Paradise."
trans-unit.target: Agus cuir isteach Mo Paradise. "

trans-unit.source: I swear by this city, Makkah -
trans-unit.target: I swear ag an chathair, Makkah -

trans-unit.source: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
trans-unit.target: Agus tú, [O Muhammad], atá saor in aisce srianta sa chathair -

trans-unit.source: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an t-athair agus go raibh a rugadh a [air],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man into hardship.
trans-unit.target: Táimid tar éis a cruthaíodh cinnte fear isteach cruatan.

trans-unit.source: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
trans-unit.target: An cheapann sé go mbeidh riamh aon duine a shárú air?

trans-unit.source: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
trans-unit.target: Deir sé, "Chaith mé saibhreas flúirseach."

trans-unit.source: Does he think that no one has seen him?
trans-unit.target: An cheapann sé go bhfuil aon duine le feiceáil air?

trans-unit.source: Have We not made for him two eyes?
trans-unit.target: Táimid tar éis nach bhfuil déanta dó dhá shúil?

trans-unit.source: And a tongue and two lips?
trans-unit.target: Agus teanga agus dhá liopaí?

trans-unit.source: And have shown him the two ways?
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé léirithe aige an dhá bhealach?

trans-unit.source: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
trans-unit.target: Ach nach bhfuil sé briste tríd an pas deacair.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é [briseadh tríd] an pas deacair?

trans-unit.source: It is the freeing of a slave
trans-unit.target: Tá sé an saoradh sclábhaí

trans-unit.source: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
trans-unit.target: Nó beathú ar lá den ocras dian

trans-unit.source: An orphan of near relationship
trans-unit.target: Dílleachta caidreamh aice

trans-unit.source: Or a needy person in misery
trans-unit.target: Nó duine ngéarghátar in ainnise

trans-unit.source: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
trans-unit.target: Agus ansin a bheith i measc iad siúd a chreid agus comhairle chéile chun foighne agus comhairle chéile chun compassion.

trans-unit.source: Those are the companions of the right.
trans-unit.target: Sin iad na compánaigh an gceart.

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
trans-unit.target: Ach siad a disbelieved Inár comharthaí - iad siúd na compánaigh na láimhe clé.

trans-unit.source: Over them will be fire closed in.
trans-unit.target: Os a gcionn beidh dóiteáin dúnta isteach.

trans-unit.source: By the sun and its brightness
trans-unit.target: De réir an ghrian agus a gile

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it follows it
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an ghealach nuair leanann sé é

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it displays it
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an lá nuair a thaispeánann sé é

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers it
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an oíche nuair a bhaineann sé é

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an spéir agus té a tógadh é

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an domhain agus té a scaipeadh

trans-unit.source: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an anam agus té a chomhréireach sé

trans-unit.source: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
trans-unit.target: Agus spreag sé [le discernment de] a wickedness agus a righteousness,

trans-unit.source: He has succeeded who purifies it,
trans-unit.target: Tá sé ag éirigh a purifies sé,

trans-unit.source: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
trans-unit.target: Agus gur mhainnigh sé a instills sé [le éilliú].

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
trans-unit.target: Thamud Shéan [n fáidh] mar gheall ar a n-transgression,

trans-unit.source: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
trans-unit.target: Nuair a cuireadh an chuid is mó wretched acu amach.

trans-unit.source: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
trans-unit.target: Agus an teachtaire de Allah [Salih] dúirt leo: "[Ná dochar] an sí-camaill de Allah nó [cosc uirthi ó] h deoch."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
trans-unit.target: Ach shéan siad air agus hamstrung uirthi.

trans-unit.source: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní dhéanann sé eagla ar an dá dheasca.

trans-unit.source: By the night when it covers
trans-unit.target: De réir an oíche nuair a bhaineann sé

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it appears
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an lá nuair a dhealraíonn sé

trans-unit.source: And [by] He who created the male and female,
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] An té a chruthaigh an fir agus mná,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá do chuid iarrachtaí éagsúla.

trans-unit.source: As for he who gives and fears Allah
trans-unit.target: Maidir té a thugann agus eagla Allah

trans-unit.source: And believes in the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: Agus creideann sé i an chuid is fearr [luaíocht],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Déanfaimid mhaolú air i dtreo gan stró.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
trans-unit.target: Ach de réir mar le té a cheilt agus mheasann féin saor riachtanas

trans-unit.source: And denies the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: Agus séanann an [luaíocht] is fearr,

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward difficulty.
trans-unit.target: Déanfaimid mhaolú air i dtreo deacracht.

trans-unit.source: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad a bheidh a saibhreas leas a bhaint dó nuair a thiteann sé?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá [dhualgas] ar Us treoir.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, a Us mbaineann an dhiaidh agus an chéad [saol].

trans-unit.source: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, tá mé rabhadh duit ar Dóiteáin atá blazing.

trans-unit.source: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
trans-unit.target: Beidh aon cheann [cuir isteach chun] sruthán ann ach amháin an ceann is wretched.

trans-unit.source: Who had denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: A bhí Shéan agus iompaithe amach.

trans-unit.source: But the righteous one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Ach beidh an ceann righteous sheachaint -

trans-unit.source: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
trans-unit.target: [Sé] a thabharfaidh [as] a saibhreas a purify féin

trans-unit.source: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
trans-unit.target: Agus ní [tabhairt] do dhaoine a rinne [déanta aige] i dtús báire a bronntar

trans-unit.source: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin ag iarraidh ar an countenance a Thiarna, is mó Ard.

trans-unit.source: And he is going to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Agus tá sé ag dul a bheith sásta.

trans-unit.source: By the morning brightness
trans-unit.target: De réir an gile na maidine

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an oíche nuair a bhaineann sé le dorchadas,

trans-unit.source: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
trans-unit.target: Níor do Thiarna glactha cead agat, [O Muhammad], ná níl detested sé [agat].

trans-unit.source: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
trans-unit.target: Agus is é an dá ngairtear níos fearr duit ná an chéad [saol].

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Agus is é do Thiarna ag dul a thabhairt duit, agus beidh tú sásta.

trans-unit.source: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
trans-unit.target: Ní raibh sé a fhaigheann tú dílleachta agus a thabhairt [duit] tearmann?

trans-unit.source: And He found you lost and guided [you],
trans-unit.target: Agus fuair sé caillte agat agus treoraithe [tú],

trans-unit.source: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Agus fuair sé bocht tú, agus rinne [tú] féin a choinneáil.

trans-unit.source: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, mar an dílleachta, ná oppress [dó].

trans-unit.source: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
trans-unit.target: Agus mar do na achainíoch, ná repel [dó].

trans-unit.source: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
trans-unit.target: Ach mar an bhfabhar do Thiarna, a thuairisciú [é].

trans-unit.source: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
trans-unit.target: An raibh muid nach leathnú ar do shon, [O Muhammad], do bhrollach?

trans-unit.source: And We removed from you your burden
trans-unit.target: Agus a bhaint againn uait do ualach

trans-unit.source: Which had weighed upon your back
trans-unit.target: Bhí mheá acu ar do dhroim

trans-unit.source: And raised high for you your repute.
trans-unit.target: Agus tógadh ard ar do shon do cháil.

trans-unit.source: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: I gcás go deimhin, le cruatan [Beidh] mhaolú.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, le cruatan [Beidh] mhaolú.

trans-unit.source: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, nuair a bheidh tú críochnaithe [do dhualgais], ansin seasamh suas [haghaidh adhradh].

trans-unit.source: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
trans-unit.target: Agus le do Thiarna díreach [do] longing.

trans-unit.source: By the fig and the olive
trans-unit.target: De réir an fige agus an olóige

trans-unit.source: And [by] Mount Sinai
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] Mount Sinai

trans-unit.source: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],
trans-unit.target: Agus [ag] an chathair slán [Makkah],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
trans-unit.target: Táimid tar éis a cruthaíodh cinnte fear sa chuid is fearr de stature;

trans-unit.source: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
trans-unit.target: Ansin againn air filleadh ar an ráta is ísle de na íseal,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin i gcás iad siúd a chreideann agus a dhéanann gníomhais righteous, chun go mbeidh siad ag luach saothair gan bhriseadh.

trans-unit.source: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, cad go fóill is cúis leat a dhiúltú ar an Recompense?

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
trans-unit.target: Nach bhfuil Allah an chuid is mó díreach de breithiúna?

trans-unit.source: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
trans-unit.target: Aithris in ainm do Tiarna a chruthaigh -

trans-unit.source: Created man from a clinging substance.
trans-unit.target: fear a cruthaíodh ó shubstaint clinging.

trans-unit.source: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
trans-unit.target: Aithris, agus tá do Thiarna an chuid is mó fial -

trans-unit.source: Who taught by the pen -
trans-unit.target: Cé múinte ag an peann -

trans-unit.source: Taught man that which he knew not.
trans-unit.target: Fear múinte nach raibh a fhios aige.

trans-unit.source: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Mar a fheiceann sé é féin féin a choinneáil.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, le do Thiarna bhfuil an tuairisceán.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who forbids
trans-unit.target: An bhfaca tú an ceann a cosc

trans-unit.source: A servant when he prays?
trans-unit.target: A seirbhíseach nuair guí sé?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
trans-unit.target: An bhfaca tú má tá sé ar treoir

trans-unit.source: Or enjoins righteousness?
trans-unit.target: Nó enjoins righteousness?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
trans-unit.target: An bhfuil feicthe agat má dhiúltaíonn sé féin agus casadh ar shiúl -

trans-unit.source: Does he not know that Allah sees?
trans-unit.target: An ní a fhios aige go bhfeiceann Allah?

trans-unit.source: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: A lying, sinning forelock.
trans-unit.target: A atá suite, sinning forelock.

trans-unit.source: Then let him call his associates;
trans-unit.target: Ansin lig dó glaoch a Associates;

trans-unit.source: We will call the angels of Hell.
trans-unit.target: Beidh muid ag glaoch aingeal ifreann.

trans-unit.source: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, chuir muid an Qur'an síos le linn an Oíche na Foraithne.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an Oíche na Foraithne?

trans-unit.source: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
trans-unit.target: Is é an Oíche na Foraithne fearr ná míle mhí.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
trans-unit.target: Aingeal agus an Spiorad descend ann le cead a Thiarna le haghaidh gach ábhar.

trans-unit.source: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
trans-unit.target: Síocháin is go teacht chun cinn breacadh an lae.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -
trans-unit.target: Iad siúd a disbelieved measc an Phobail na Scrioptúr agus an polytheists níor bheith parted [ó misbelief] go dtí go tháinig siad fianaise shoiléir -

trans-unit.source: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
trans-unit.target: A Messenger ó Allah, ag aithris scrioptúir íonaithe

trans-unit.source: Within which are correct writings.
trans-unit.target: Laistigh díobh a scríbhinní ceart.

trans-unit.source: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.
trans-unit.target: Ná raibh iad sin a tugadh an Scripture ina roinnte go dtí tar éis a bhí ann teacht chucu fianaise shoiléir.

trans-unit.source: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.
trans-unit.target: Agus ní raibh siad commanded amháin chun adhradh Allah, [á] ó chroí a ghabháil dó i reiligiún, chlaontachta le fírinne, agus paidir a bhunú agus zakah a thabhairt.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh siad a disbelieved measc an Phobail na Scrioptúr agus na polytheists bheith sa tine de Ifreann, géilliúil eternally ann.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá siad a chreid agus a rinneadh gníomhais righteous - iad siúd an chuid is fearr na créatúir.

trans-unit.source: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Beidh a gcuid luaíocht le Allah a bheith gairdíní cónaithe suthain faoi bhun a sreabhadh aibhneacha, wherein bheidh siad cloí go deo, Allah a bheith sásta leo agus tá siad le Eisean.

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
trans-unit.target: Nuair a bhíonn an domhan chroitheadh lena [leagan deireanach] crith talún

trans-unit.source: And the earth discharges its burdens
trans-unit.target: Agus Comhlíonann an domhain a ualaigh

trans-unit.source: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
trans-unit.target: Agus deir an fear, "Cad é [cearr] leis?"

trans-unit.source: That Day, it will report its news
trans-unit.target: Go Lá, beidh sé tuairisc a nuacht

trans-unit.source: Because your Lord has commanded it.
trans-unit.target: Mar gheall ar do Tiarna commanded air.

trans-unit.source: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Go Lá, beidh na daoine imeacht scartha [i gcatagóirí] a thaispeáint [thoradh] a n-gníomhais.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, whoever beidh adamh ar mheáchan an dea fheiceáil,

trans-unit.source: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
trans-unit.target: Agus whoever dhéanann Beidh adamh ar thromachar na olc é a fheiceáil.

trans-unit.source: By the racers, panting,
trans-unit.target: Faoi na racers, panting,

trans-unit.source: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
trans-unit.target: Agus na táirgeoirí Sparks [nuair] buailte

trans-unit.source: And the chargers at dawn,
trans-unit.target: Agus na chargers ag an tús,

trans-unit.source: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,
trans-unit.target: Stirring suas rud [scamaill] deannaigh,

trans-unit.source: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
trans-unit.target: Ag teacht rud i lár dteannta a chéile,

trans-unit.source: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin cine daonna, a Thiarna, is ungrateful.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin, tá sé leis an fhinné.

trans-unit.source: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
trans-unit.target: Agus go deimhin tá sé, i ngrá an rachmais, dian.

trans-unit.source: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
trans-unit.target: Ach nach bhfuil a fhios aige go bhfuil nuair a an t-ábhar na huaigheanna atá scaipthe

trans-unit.source: And that within the breasts is obtained,
trans-unit.target: Agus is é sin laistigh de na breasts a fhaightear,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, a Thiarna leo, is Lá é, [hiomlán] acquainted.

trans-unit.source: The Striking Calamity -
trans-unit.target: An Calamity buailte -

trans-unit.source: What is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: Cad é an Calamity buailte?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an Calamity buailte?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
trans-unit.target: Is é an Lá nuair a bheidh daoine a bheith cosúil leamhain, scaipthe,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
trans-unit.target: Agus beidh na sléibhte a bheith cosúil le olann, fluffed suas.

trans-unit.source: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
trans-unit.target: Ansin, mar atá ar cheann amháin a bhfuil a scálaí atá trom [le gníomhais maith],

trans-unit.source: He will be in a pleasant life.
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé a bheith i saol taitneamhach.

trans-unit.source: But as for one whose scales are light,
trans-unit.target: Ach mar cheann amháin a bhfuil a scálaí atá éadrom,

trans-unit.source: His refuge will be an abyss.
trans-unit.target: Beidh a dhídean ina abyss.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what that is?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é sin?

trans-unit.source: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
trans-unit.target: Is mór an Dóiteáin, intensely te.

trans-unit.source: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
trans-unit.target: Iomaíocht i [worldly] méadú diverts leat

trans-unit.source: Until you visit the graveyards.
trans-unit.target: Go dtí go thugann tú cuairt ar an reiligí.

trans-unit.source: No! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: Then no! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Ansin ní!

trans-unit.source: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: You will surely see the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Feicfidh tú surely an Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh tú a fheiceáil surely sé leis an tsúil de cinnteacht.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Ansin, beidh tú go n-iarrfaí surely go lá faoi pléisiúir.

trans-unit.source: By time,
trans-unit.target: De réir ama,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá cine daonna i caillteanas,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
trans-unit.target: Ach amháin dóibh siúd a chreid agus a rinneadh gníomhais righteous agus comhairle chéile chun fírinne agus comhairle chéile chun foighne.

trans-unit.source: Woe to every scorner and mocker
trans-unit.target: Mairg gach scorner agus mocker

trans-unit.source: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
trans-unit.target: A bhailíonn saibhreas agus [go leanúnach] chomhaireamh sé.

trans-unit.source: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
trans-unit.target: Síleann sé go mbeidh a chuid saibhris a dhéanamh bás a fháil air.

trans-unit.source: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
trans-unit.target: Uimh!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
trans-unit.target: Agus cad is féidir a dhéanamh a fhios agat cad é an Crusher?

trans-unit.source: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
trans-unit.target: Tá sé an tine de Allah, [eternally] bhreoslaítear,

trans-unit.source: Which mounts directed at the hearts.
trans-unit.target: Cad iad na ghairis dírithe ar an gcroí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, beidh Hellfire dúnta síos orthu

trans-unit.source: In extended columns.
trans-unit.target: I gcolúin leathnaithe.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
trans-unit.target: Bíodh nach tú a mheas, [O Muhammad], conas dhéileáil do Tiarna leis an compánach an eilifint?

trans-unit.source: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
trans-unit.target: Ní raibh sé a dhéanamh ar a bplean isteach misguidance?

trans-unit.source: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
trans-unit.target: Agus chuir sé i gcoinne éin orthu i dtréada,

trans-unit.source: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
trans-unit.target: Bualadh iad le clocha cré crua,

trans-unit.source: And He made them like eaten straw.
trans-unit.target: Agus rinne sé iad mar tuí ithe.

trans-unit.source: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
trans-unit.target: Chun slándáil accustomed an Quraysh -

trans-unit.source: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
trans-unit.target: A n-urrús accustomed [i] an caravan an gheimhridh agus an tsamhraidh -

trans-unit.source: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
trans-unit.target: Lig dóibh adhartha an Tiarna an Tí,

trans-unit.source: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
trans-unit.target: Cé go bhfuil a chothú dóibh, [iad a shábháil] ó ocras agus rinne slán iad, [iad a shábháil] ó eagla.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: An bhfaca tú an ceann a dhiúltaíonn an Recompense?

trans-unit.source: For that is the one who drives away the orphan
trans-unit.target: I gcás go bhfuil an duine a thiomáineann ar shiúl an dílleachta

trans-unit.source: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
trans-unit.target: Agus nach bhfuil an bheathú na mbocht a spreagadh.

trans-unit.source: So woe to those who pray
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, mairg dóibh siúd a guí

trans-unit.source: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
trans-unit.target: [Ach] atá heedless ar a urnaí -

trans-unit.source: Those who make show [of their deeds]
trans-unit.target: Iad siúd a dhéanann seó [gcuid gníomhais]

trans-unit.source: And withhold [simple] assistance.
trans-unit.target: Agus a choinneáil siar [simplí] Cúnamh.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá muid a deonaíodh duit, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

trans-unit.source: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
trans-unit.target: Mar sin, guí chuig do Thiarna agus íobairt [chun Eisean amháin].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.
trans-unit.target: Go deimhin, tá do namhaid an ceann ghearradh amach.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Abair, "O disbelievers,

trans-unit.source: I do not worship what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ní féidir liom a adhradh cad a adhradh tú.

trans-unit.source: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Ná go bhfuil tú worshippers cad a adhradh mé.

trans-unit.source: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ná ní bheidh mé a bheith ina worshiper ar cad a adhradh agat.

trans-unit.source: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Ná ní beidh tú a bheith worshippers cad a adhradh mé.

trans-unit.source: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
trans-unit.target: Chun tú go bhfuil do reiligiún, agus go dtí mé é mo reiligiún. "

trans-unit.source: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
trans-unit.target: Nuair a bheidh an bua na Allah teacht agus an conquest,

trans-unit.source: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
trans-unit.target: Agus a fheiceann tú na daoine dul i mbun an reiligiún na Allah in multitudes,

trans-unit.source: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
trans-unit.target: Ansin exalt [Eisean] le moladh do Tiarna agus a iarraidh maithiúnas air.

trans-unit.source: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
trans-unit.target: Bealtaine lámha na Abu Lahab a scriosta, agus scriosta tá sé.

trans-unit.source: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
trans-unit.target: Ní bheidh a chuid saibhris leas a bhaint dó nó go bhfuil faighte aige.

trans-unit.source: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
trans-unit.target: Beidh sé [cuir isteach chun] dhó i Dóiteáin [Blazing] lasair

trans-unit.source: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
trans-unit.target: Agus a bhean chéile [mar aon] - an t-iompróir an connadh.

trans-unit.source: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
trans-unit.target: Timpeall uirthi mhuineál Is súgán [twisted] snáithín.

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,
trans-unit.target: Abair, "Tá sé Allah, [atá] Amháin,

trans-unit.source: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.
trans-unit.target: Allah, an Tearmann Eternal.

trans-unit.source: He neither begets nor is born,
trans-unit.target: Sé ní begets ná rugadh,

trans-unit.source: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."
trans-unit.target: Ná níl dó d'aon choibhéis. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
trans-unit.target: Abair, "lorg mé dhídean sa Tiarna na breacadh an lae

trans-unit.source: From the evil of that which He created
trans-unit.target: Ó olc sin a chruthaigh sé

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
trans-unit.target: Agus ó olc an dorchadais nuair a settles sé

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
trans-unit.target: Agus ó olc na séidirí in muirmhíle

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
trans-unit.target: Agus ó olc ar envier nuair envies sé. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Abair, "lorg mé dhídean sa Tiarna an chine daonna,

trans-unit.source: The Sovereign of mankind.
trans-unit.target: An Fhlaitheasacha an chine daonna.

trans-unit.source: The God of mankind,
trans-unit.target: An Dia an chine daonna,

trans-unit.source: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -
trans-unit.target: Ó olc an whisperer cúlú -

trans-unit.source: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
trans-unit.target: Cé whispers [olc] isteach na breasts an chine daonna -

trans-unit.source: From among the jinn and mankind."
trans-unit.target: As measc na jinn agus cine daonna. "
